Wonne Icaka owacce ni, “In aŋa doki?” Ogamo ni, “An a wodi do, latin kayoni, Ecau do.”

Kom Icaka ocako myel matek twatwal, kun waco ni, “Aŋa ma nakanen koŋ odwaro lee, okella-ni, ma doŋ atyeko camone woko ducu, ma onoŋo peya idwogo-ni, dok atyeko lamma gum woko do, gum doŋ bidebo gire i kome.”
Ka Ecau owinyo lok pa wonne, ocako tokke ki cwar koko madit, magwa bene, kun waco bot wonne ni, “Lamme gum bene do, aya abana!”
En dok owacce ni, “Omeru obino, obwola, ci doŋ otyeko buyo gummi woko.”

Ecau owacce ni, “Pe gicako nyiŋe Yakobo atir? Nen, en doŋ oridde ka laro jamina kiryo kulu. Okwoŋo buyo dit anywillina, doki nen, in bene dok otyeko buyo gumma woko.” Dok omedde ki waco lok ni, “In nene pe igwoko gum pira ce?”

Icaka ogamo dog Ecau ni, “Nen, doŋ atyeko keto en me bedo rwodi otum, ki omege ducu atyeko miyogi me bedo luticce; amiye wa kal ki koŋo vino ducu gubed me pito en. Gin aŋo ma dok abimiyi ba, latinna?”
Ecau dok owaco bot wonne ni, “Onoŋo itye ki gum acel keken bo, wora? Lamma gum, lamma gom mo bene do, aya abana.” Ecau otiŋo wiye malo ka koko.
Wonne Icaka ocako gamo lokke ni, “Nen, ibibedo bor ki lobo ma ceko cam mapek, dok ibibedo bor ki toyo ma luk a ki malo i polo.
Ibikwo meri ki lak pala lucwanni, ibibedo latic pa omeru; ento i kare ma ibijemo i kome, ci ibituro rii okol ma oriyo i ŋutini.” Icaka ocwalo Yakobo i Karan
Ecau ocako kwero ominne pi gum ma wonne olamo i kome-ni. Ecau opiro lok i cwinye ni, “Kare me to pa wora doŋ onyiko cok; en aye abineko iye omera Yakobo bene.”
Ento ka gitito ki Labeka lok pa latin kayone Ecau, en ocwalo dano, olwoŋo Yakobo wode matidine, owacce ni, “Nen, omeru Ecau obedo ma cwinye yom kun oyubbe me neki.
Mumiyo in iwor doga, latinna; a malo, ilwi, iriŋ woko bot omera Laban i Karan.
Koŋ icibed kunnu, nio waŋ ma kiniga pa omeru opye;
wek wiye koŋ owil i gin ma yam itimo i keme-ni; ka doŋ abicwalo dano ka omi ki kunnu. Piŋo wun aryo ducu myero wurweny woko ki i waŋa lawaŋacel?”
Ka Labeka dok owaco bot Icaka ni, “An doŋ kwona ool woko ki kit kwo pa mon Kit. Ka dok Yakobo bene binyomo anyira Kit ma rom ki mon ma gitye i lobo-ni, ci doŋ kwona konyo aŋo?”
Ka Icaka olwoŋo Yakobo, ci olamme gum, ka ocike ni, “In doŋ pe inyom dako mo ki i kin anyira me Kanaan.
Ber ia, icit Paddan-aram i ot pa kwaru Becweri ma won meni; en aye inyom iye nya pa Laban ma omin meni kikome.
Lubaŋa Matweroducu omiyi gum, omiyi inya mapol, wek ibed lwak rok mapol.
Dok omi gum pa Abraim opot i komi, ki i kom likwayi, wek icam lobo ma ibedo iye-ni macalo welo, ma yam Lubaŋa omiyo ki Abraim!”
Kit meno Icaka ocwalo Yakobo, ocito i Paddan-aram bot Laban, wod pa Becweri me Aram, ma omin Labeka ma min Yakobo ki Ecau. Ecau dok onyomo dako mukene
Ecau oneno ni Icaka doŋ otyeko lamo gum i kom Yakobo, ka dok ocwale wa i Paddan-aram wek onyom dako ki kunnu, dok i kare ma olamme gum ocike ni, “In pe inyom nyako mo ki i kin Lukanaan,”
dok Yakobo bene oworo dog wonne ki minne, ci ocito i Paddan-aram.
Ka Ecau oneno ni kit pa anyira Kanaan pe yomo cwiny wonne Icaka,
ci ocito bot jo Icmael, onyomo iye dako, omedo i kom mere ma con ca. Onyomo Makalat ma nya pa Icmael wod pa Abraim, ma lamiŋ Nebayot. Lek obino i wi Yakobo i Betel
Yakobo oa ki, Beer-ceba, ci odok tuŋ Karan.
Ka oo i kabedo mo, obuto kenyo i dyewor meno, pien onoŋo ceŋ doŋ opoto woko. Ka otiŋo got acel mo ki i kin wadi, opyelo piny, oteno ki wiye, ci onino woko i kabedo meno.
Lek obino i wiye, oneno rwom ma gijeŋo tere ocuŋ piny i ŋom, kun wiye gijeŋo oo wa i polo; ka oneno lumalaika pa Lubaŋa kun gilor piny, ka dok giito gidok malo.
Oneno Rwot ocuŋ tuŋ ka wiye malo, kun waco ni, “An a Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwaru Abraim, ki Lubaŋa pa Icaka; abimiyi lobo ma ibuto iye-ni, abimiyo boti ki bot likwayi;

dok likwayi gibibedo ma rom ki apwa me lobo, dok wubimedde wuromo yo tuŋ potoceŋ ki tuŋ wokceŋ, ki yo tuŋ acam ki tuŋ acuc bene; dok i kom in ki i kom likwayi en aye kaka ducu ma wi lobo bilimo iye gumgi.
Nen, an atye kwedi, abigwoki ka ma ibiwoto iye ducu, dok abidwoki cen wa i lobo man; pe abiweki ata nio waŋ ma acobo gin ma atyeko i okone boti-ni.”
Ka Yakobo oco woko ki i waŋ nino, ci owacci, “Rwot tye i kabedo-ni ada; onoŋo an kara pe aŋeyo.”
Ci lworo ocako make, kun wacci, “Kabedo man kara lik kuman! Man ot pa Lubaŋa kikome, man aye dog gaŋ me polo.”
Yakobo oa malo odiko con, otino got ma oteno ki wiye-ni, ci ocibo wek obed wir, ka oonyo moo i wiye.
Ocako nyiŋ kabedo meno ni Betel; ento nia wa con onoŋo nyiŋ kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni Luj.
Yakobo ocako kwoŋo kwoŋ kun waco ni, “Ka Lubaŋa bibedo kweda, kun gwoka i yo man ma awoto iye-ni, ka dok bimiya kwon me acama, ki boŋŋi me aruka,
ka ce abidwogo wa i ot pa wora ki kuc, ci Rwot doŋ bibedo Lubaŋana,
ki got man bene, ma acibo me bedo wir, bidoko ot pa Lubaŋa: ki gin ducu ma ibimina, an bene abimini dul acel me aparre.”
Yakobo dok omedde ki wotte, ka oo i lobo pa jo ma tuŋ wokceŋ.
Ka obedo ka neno piny, ci oneno waŋ pii i dye bar, lwak romi gubuto piny dul adek ma gicok i ŋet waŋ pii; pien romi gimato pii i waŋ it meno. Got ma giumo ki doge bene dwoŋ:
ka romi ducu doŋ gugurre, gucokke kunnu, ka lukwat gitorre, giloro got woko cen ki i dog waŋ pii, ka gimiyo romi gimato, ka dok giloro got, gidwoko cen, giumo ki dog waŋ pii kakare.
Yakobo openyogi ni, “Utmega, wun wua ki kwene?” Gugamo ni, “Wan waa ki i Karan.”
Owaco botgi ni, “Wun mono wuŋeyo Laban wod pa Nakor?” Gugamo ni, “Waŋeyo en.”
Owaco botgi ni, “En tye maber kono?” Gugamo ni, “En tye maber gire. Nen, nyare Lakeri ka bino ki romigi ca!”
En ogamo ni, “Nen, tipo peya olokke do, man peya kare me guro lim kacel; ber wumi pii ki romi, ci dok wuciti, wukwagi aye.”
Ento gin gutitte ni, “Wan pe watwero miyogi, waŋ ma lim ducu gucokke, gugurre kacel, ka doŋ gicwalo got woko cen ki i dog waŋ pii, ka doŋ wamiyoromi pii.”
Ka onoŋo en tye ka lok kwedgi, ci Lakeri ocoro ki romi pa wonne, ma onoŋo kwayogi.
Ka Yakobo oneno Lakeri nya pa Laban, nya pa omin minne, ki romi pa nerone Laban, Yakobo okato ci ocwalo got woko cen ki i dog waŋ pii, ka ocako mi yo romi pa nerone Laban gumato pii.
Ci Yakobo onoto lem Lakeri, kun kok matek.
Yakobo otito ki Lakeri ni, en e wat pa wonne kikome, en e wod pa Labeka; ci en oriŋo, ocito otito ki wonne.
Ka Laban owinyo lok kom Yakobo wod pa laminne, ci oriŋo ocito ka ŋolo wiye; okwako kore, onoto leme bene, ka ocako tere wa i ode. Yakobo oyeko lok magi ducu kikore bot Laban,
ka Laban owacce ni, “In ada i cogona dok i riŋo koma bene!” Ci obedo kwede dwe acel.
Laban ocako waco bot Yakobo ni, “Pien in i watta, doŋ ibitina tic nono bo? Ber ititta, imito aculli gin aŋo?”
Onoŋo Laban tye ki anyirane aryo; nyiŋ nyare maditte Lea, ki nyiŋ matidine Lakeri.
Lea onoŋo wane kiŋiŋic, ento Lakeri nen mwonya muliŋŋe.
Yakobo onoŋo maro Lakeri: ci owacci, “Abitini tic mwaka abiro pi Lakeri, nyari matidi-ni.”
Laban ogamo ni, “Onoŋo bedo ber ka amiyo en boti, kato ma kono amiyo bot dano mukene; bed bota.”
Yakobo otiyo pi Lakeri mwaka abiro; kare meno obedo macalo nino manok mo ki bot Yakobo, pien onoŋo iye omaro Lakeri mada.
Yakobo openyo Laban ni, “Doŋ imiya dakona wek abed kwede, pien kare doŋ oromo.”
Laban otedo karama ci olwoŋo iye dano ducu ma gitye i kabedo meno.
Ci okelo nyare Lea bot Yakobo otyeno, ocako bedo kwede.
Laban omiyo aŋecane Jilpa bot nyare Lea wek okonye.
Ka odiko ma piny oru, Yakobo oneno kara gimiye Lea. Yakobo owaco ki Laban ni, “Itima kuman piŋo? Onoŋo pe abedo ka tic boti pi Lakeri? Ibwola kuman piŋo?”
Laban ogamo ni, “Pe gitimo kuman i lobo tuwa kany, pe gimiyo nyako matidi aye kwoŋo ger ki maditte.
Koŋ ityek cabit pi man acel-li, ci dok wabimiyi giri mukene bene, ka ibitina tic mwaka abiro mukene.”
Yakobo otimo kit meno; ocobo cabit pa Lea, ka Laban omiye nyare Lakeri me bedo dakone.
Laban dok omiyo aŋecane Bila bot nyare Lakeri wek okonye.
Yakobo ocako bedo ki Lakeri bene; cwinye omaro Lakeri makato Lea, dok omedde otiyo tic bot Laban mwaka mukene abiro. Litino ma ginywalo ki Yakobo
Ka Rwot oneno ni gidag Lea, ci oyabo iye; ento Lakeri ocuŋ ma pe nywal.
Lea ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco, ci ocako nyiŋe Reuben, kun waco ni, “Pien Rwot oneno aromana; koni olo doŋ cwara bimara.”
Dok ogamo ic, ci onywalo latin laco, owacci, “Pien Rwot owinyo ni gidaga, omiyo dok omiya latin man bene”; ci ocako nyiŋe ni Cimeon.
Lacen dok ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco, owacci, “Cwara doŋ bidwogo i koma, pien doŋ anywalle awobe adek kulu”; mumiyo gicako nyiŋ latin-nu Levi.
Dok ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco, owacci, “Man aye kare ma abipako iye Rwot”; mumiyo ocako nyiŋ latin Juda; ci koŋ ocuŋ woko.
Ka Lakeri oneno ni pe enywalo latin mo ki Yakobo, ci nyeko omake kom laminne. Ka owaco bot Yakobo ni, “Miya litino; ka pe, ci adene woko.”
Kiniga omako Yakobo i kom Lakeri, kun wacce ni, “Iketa adoko Lubaŋa bo, ma en ogeŋi nywalli?”
Lakeri ogamo ni, “Aŋecana Bila en do, doŋ ibed kwede, wek onywal latin mo ma kakara, wek an bene anoŋ litino mogo ki tuŋ bote.”
Ci omiyo aŋecane obedo dakone, Yakobo ocako bedo kwede.
Bila ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco ki Yakobo.
Lakeri owaco ni, “Lubaŋa otyeko ŋolla kop, owinyo ki dwana bene, ci omiya gira latin laco”; omiyo ocako nyiŋe Dan.
Bila aŋeca pa Lakeri dok ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco ki Yakobo me aryone.
Lakeri dok owacci, “Ka me lweny doŋ alwenyo matek wan ki lamera, ci aloye”; mumiyo ocako nyiŋ latin Naputali.
Ka Lea bene oneno ni doŋ ecuŋ woko, ma pe enywalo litino, ci otiŋo aŋecane Jilpa, omiyo ki Yakobo wek obed dakone.
Aŋeca pa Lea bene onywalo latin laco ki Yakobo.
Lea owacci, “Gum maber!” Mumiyo ocako nyiŋe Gad.
Jilpa aŋeca pa Lea dok onywalo latin laco ki Yakobo me aryone.
Lea owacci, “An koma gum! Pien mon gibilwoŋa ni lagumkom”; mumiyo en ocako nyiŋ latin ni Acer.
I kare me kayo ŋano, Reuben ocito i poto, ci onoŋo iye yat nyodo, ci okelogi wa bot minne Lea. Ka Lakeri olego Lea ni, “Alegi, imiya yat nyodo pa wodi mogo do.”
Ento en ogamo ni, “In imayo cwara woko ki bota, itamo ni lokke tidi ce? Man dok imito ni ikwany yat nyodo pa woda woko bene?” Lakeri ogamo ni, “En tin obut kwedi dyewor ma ka yat nyodo pa wodi.”
Ka Yakobo odwogo nia ki i tim otyeno, Lea okato ocito ka ŋolo wiye iyo, owacce ni, “Myero tin idony i oda; pien atyeko wilo in ki yat nyodo pa woda.” Ci ocito obuto ki Lea i dyewor meno.
Lubaŋa owinyo lega pa Lea, ci ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco me abicce ki Yakobo.
Lea owacci, “Lubaŋa doŋ oculo waŋ miyo aŋecana bot cwara”; mumiyo ocako nyiŋe Icakar.
Lea dok ogamo, oyac, onywalo latin me abicelle ki Yakobo.
Lea dok owacci, “Lubaŋa doŋ omiya mot me lim keny mabeco; cwara doŋ biketta deyo, pien doŋ atyeko nywalle litino co abicel kulu”; mumiyo ocako nyiŋe Jabulon.
Lacen dok onywalo nyare, ci ocako nyiŋe Dina.
Lubaŋa doŋ ocako po i kom Lakeri, dok owinyo legane bene, ka oyabo iye.
Ci ogamo, onywalo latin laco, kun wacci, “Lubaŋa otyeko kwanyo lewic woko ki i koma”;
ci ocako nyiŋe Yucepu, kun wacci, “Myero Rwot dok omedda latin laco mo acel!” Lok ma Yakobo oyubo ki Laban kom mucarane
Ka Lakeri otyeko nywalo Yucepu, ci Yakobo owaco bot Laban ni, “Doŋ icwala wek adok paco i lobo tuwa.
Miya monna ki litinona ma yam atiyo pigi boti-ni, wek doŋ aciti; in bene iŋeyo gin ma atiyo boti do.”
Laban ogamo ni, “Ka iye, ci koŋ alokki gin mo; pien atyeto ci aniaŋ ni Rwot omiya gum pi in.
Ber ititta gin ma imito amini me mucarani, ci abimini.”
Yakobo owacce ni, “In kikomi iŋeyo kit ma atiyo ki ticci, ki kit ma agwoko kwede limmi.
Pien yam ma peya abino onoŋo limmi nok mo, nen doŋ gumedde madwoŋ mukato; Rwot obedo ka mini gum ka ma adok iye ducu. Ento an abinoŋo lim ma tuŋ bota awene?”
En ogamo ni, “Gin aŋo ma abimini?” Yakobo ogamo ni, “In pe ibimiya gin mo wacel. Ka ibiye, tima gin macalo man, an abimedde ka kwayo limmi, ki gwokogi bene.

Wek tin acit awot i kin limmi ducu, wek ayer ki i kingi romi ma gubedo aciri aciri ki ma abacabac, ki litino romi macol ducu, kacel ki dyegi ma gubedo abacabac ki ma aciri aciri; meno gin aye gibibedo mucarana.
Kit meno leŋ cwinya binen lacen, ka ibibino ka ŋiyo kom mucarana. Ka ibinoŋ o dyegi ma komgi pe aciri aciri ki abacabac, ki litino romi ma pe gicol gitye i kin mega, meno gibikwano ni ma gikwalo.”
Ci Laban ogamo ni, “Ber, wek obed kit ma iwaco-ni.”
Ento i nino meno Laban okoyo nyogi dyegi ma gubedo kitana kitana, ki ma abacabac, ki megi dyegi ma gubedo aciri aciri ki abacabac, ma kitartar ducu, ki litino romi ducu macol, oketo i cin awobene.
Opoko kingi woko ki Yakobo ma borre romo wot me nino adek kulu; Yakobo odoŋ ka kwayo lim pa Laban mudoŋŋe.
Yakobo ocako jako jaŋ pobo madyak ki yaa ki ogali, ci oŋweko pokgi, wek kom kedi onen ŋwalaŋwala.
Oketo kedi ma oŋweko komgi, opyelogi i nyim romi i weer pii, ka ma gionyo iye pii, ka ma lim cito iye ka mato pii, pien nyogine giyito megine ka gibino ka mato pii.
Ka giyitogi i nyim kedi, omiyo ginywalo litino ma akolakol, ki ma aciri aciri ki ma abacabac.
Yakobo dok opoko litino romi pat, oloko waŋ lim ka neno gin ma akolakol ki lwak lim pa Laban macolle ducu, ka opoko dul limme pat kun pe dok ribogi ki pa Laban.
I kare ma nyogi yito megine matego, ci Yakobo pyelo kedi i weer pii i nyim romi, wek oyitte i nyim kedi,
ento ka megine magorogoro aye giyitogi, en pe pyelo kedi i nyimgi; pienno lim magoro ducu pa Laban, mategone ducu pa Yakobo.
Kit meno laco meno odoko lalonyo madwoŋ, ma tye ki lwak lim, ki lwak aŋeca ki lwak opiine, ki lwak kinaga ki kana.
Yakobo obedo ka winyo kun awo be pa Laban giwaco ni, “Yakobo doŋ otero lim pa wonwa woko ducu, olimo lonyo nia ki i kom lim pa wonwa.”
Yakobo oneno ni waŋ Laban oballe woko i kome, pe dok nene maber kit macon.
Rwot owaco bot Yakobo ni, “Doŋ idok i lobo pa kwarowu bot lutuwu, an abibedo kwedi.”
Yakobo olwoŋo Lakeri ki Lea i bar olet ka ma limme tye iye,
ci owaco botgi ni, “An aneno waŋ wonwu ocido woko i koma, pe doŋ nena maber kit macon. Ento Lubaŋa pa wora yam tye kweda.
Wun wuŋeyo ni atyeko tic bot wonwu ki tekka ducu;
ci en obedo ka bwola, kun loko mucarana atata tyen apar kulu, ento Lubaŋa pe oye en otimo gin mo marac i koma.

Ka owaco ni, ‘Lim ma abacabac bibedo meri me mucarani,’ ci lim ducu ginywal mubedo abacabac keken. Ka dok oloko doge ni, ‘Lim ma gibedo akolakol gin aye bibedo meri me mucarani,’ ci lim ducu dok ginywal akolakol.
Meno aye kit ma Lubaŋa okwanyo kwede lim pa wonwu ci omiyogi bota.
“I kare ma megine giyitogi, atiŋo waŋa malo ki i waŋ lek, ci aneno nyogi ma gitigo megine komgi obedo akolakol ki abacabac ki opukopuk.
Lamalaika pa Lubaŋa owacca i waŋ lek ni,. ‘Yakobo’, an agamo ni, ‘An a ene!’
Ci owacca ni, ‘Tiŋ waŋi malo wek inen, nyogi ducu ma gitigo megine-ni gubedo akolakol ki abacabac ki opukopuk; pien atyeko neno kit ma Laban timi kwede.
An Lubaŋa me Betel, ka ma yam iwiro iye wir ki moo, ka ikwoŋo iye kwoŋ bota-ni. Doŋ ia malo, icit woko cen ki i lobe-ni, idok i lobo ma ginywali iye ca.’ “
Lakeri ki Lea gugamo ni, “Tye dok dul lim mo nyo ginaleya mo ma dok odoŋ piwa i ot pa wonwa?
Pe doŋ en nenowa macalo lurok ata? Doŋ otyeko catowa woko, tye ka camo bene lim ma gimiyo piwa woko.
Lim ducu ma doŋ Lubaŋa otyeko kwanyo ki bot wonwa doŋ mewa ki pa litinowa; doŋ gin ducu ma Lubaŋa owacci aye itim.”
Yakobo oa, oketo awobene ki monne i wi kinaga,
oleko limme ducu, ma yam olimo i Paddan-aram; ci ocako wot me dok i lobo Kanaan bot Icaka.
Laban onoŋo ocito ka ŋolo yer kom romine, ci Lakeri okwalo cal lubaŋa ki i ot pa, wonne.
Yakobo obwolo Laban La-aram, pe otitte pi wotte.
Olwi ki lwak lim ducu ma yam tye kwede, ka ocako wot, oŋolo kulu Euprate, ci okemo lobo godi me Gilead. Laban olubo kor Yakobo
Ka nino okato adek kulu, ci gitito bot Laban ni, “Yakobo doŋ otyeko lwi, ocito woko.”
En ogwarre ki lutugi, gutwarre, gulubo kore; ka guwoto nino abiro, ci gudiŋo kore cokcok i kin godi me Gilead.
Ento Lubaŋa obino bot Laban La-aram i waŋ lek, kun wacce ni, “Gwokke, pe icilok lok mo maber nyo marac bot Yakobo.”
Laban omako Yakobo iyo. Onoŋo doŋ otyeko gony woko i lobo godi, ci Laban ki lutugi gugony i lobo godi meno me Gilead.
Laban ocako lok ki Yakobo ni, “Itimo kuman piŋo, ma ibwola kit man, doŋ itiŋo anyirana, ilwi kwedgi, macalo iyakogi ayaka ki pala lucwan-ni?
Piŋo ilwi woko alwiya i muŋ ali, kun iumo waŋa ma pe ititta gin mo, ma kono nene aciki ki yomcwiny ki wer ki ajaa ki opuk?
Piŋo pe iweko aciko litinona kun anoto lem anyirana? Man itimo gin me caro a tika.
Onoŋo atwero timi marac; ento Lubaŋa pa woru oloko kweda tin i dyewor, ocika ni ‘Gwokke pe icilok lok mo maber nyo marac bot Yakobo.’
Man doŋ ia icako wot woko, pien pi ot pa woru odoko mitti mada; ento dok ikwalo ki cal lubaŋana me ŋo kono?”
Yakobo ogamo dog Laban ni, “Onoŋo abedo ki lworo, abedo ka tamo ni gwok nyo ibimayo anyirani woko ki bota.
Ka ibinoŋo cal lubaŋani bot ŋatti mo kany, ŋat meno pe bikwo. Cim koni jamini ma inoŋo tye bota kany i nyim utmegiwa ci ikwany idok giri kwede.” Onoŋo Yakobo pe oŋeyo ni Lakeri aye ma okwalogi.
Kit meno Laban ocako donyo i kemapa Yakobo, ki i kema pa Lea, ki i kema pa mon aŋeca aryo-nu ducu, ci pe omedo ki noŋogi; ka okato woko ki i kema pa Lea, dok odonyo i kema pa Lakeri.
I kare meno onoŋo Lakeri otiŋo lubaŋa-nu, ci orwakogi i kom me bedo i wi kinaga; ci obedo i wigi. Laban oŋiyo jami ma i kema ducu, pe omedo ki noŋogi.
Lakeri owaco bot wonne ni, “Laditta, pe kiniga omaki i koma ka ineno ni pe atwero a malo i nyimi, pien atye ki kit pa wan mon.” Kit meno Laban oyenyo cal lubaŋane kwe, pe omedo ki noŋogi.
Kiniga omako Yakobo, ocako da ki Laban, kun waco bot Laban ni, “Balla doŋ tye kwene kaa? Atimo bal aŋo, mumiyo ilubo kora twatwal-li?
Kadi bed iyenyo i kin jamina ducu, kit gin aŋo ma inoŋo i kom jami ducu ma oa i odi? Kel iket kany i nyim utmegini ki utmegina, wek guŋol kop i kin wan aryo-ni.
An abedo kwedi mwaka pyeraryo; pe i megi romini ki megi dyegini mo opoto, pe bene acamo nyok romoni mo.
Lim ma ŋuu aye omwodo pe akelo riŋone boti, an aye aculo gira; lim ma gikwalo i dyeceŋ ki i dyewor ipenyo bota.
Yam abedo kit meno, kun ceŋ waŋa dyeceŋ, koyo neka dyewor, pe aketo nino mo i waŋa.
I lwak mwaka pyeraryo ma abedo kwedi i odi-ni, atiyo boti mwaka apar wiye aŋwen pi anyirani aryo-ni, ki mwaka abicel pi limmi, ibedo ka loko mucarana tyen apar kulu.

Ka ce Lubaŋa pa wora, Lubaŋa pa Abraim ma Icaka bene lworo, pe obedo tuŋ bota, kono tin icwala adok tuwa ki ciŋa noŋo adada. Lubaŋa oneno twon aromana, ki tic ma atiyo ki ciŋa ci tin dyewor bene ojuki.” Yakobo ki Laban gucikke

Laban ogamo kun dok iye bot Yakobo ni, “Anyira man gin anyirana, ki litino bene gin litinona, lim bene gin limma, ki gin ma ineno-ni gin ducu limma. Ento abitimo gin aŋo tin i kom anyirana-ni, nyo i kom litinogi ma gunywalo?
Doŋ ibin wek waket gicikke i kin in ki an, me bedo caden i kin in ki an.”
Ci Yakobo otino got ocibo wek obed wir.
Ka Yakobo owaco bot utmegine ni, “Wucok got”, ci gucoko got, guguro kacel, ka gucamo cam i ŋet odur got meno.
Laban ocako nyiŋ kabedo meno ni Jegarcaduta; ento Yakobo ocako nyiŋe ni Galeed.
Laban owacci, “Odur man en aye caden i kin in ki an tin.” Mumiyo ocako nyiŋe Galeed.
Ocako nyiŋ wir meno ni Mijpa, pien owacci, “Rwot ogwok kin an ki in, ka kinwa doŋ bipokke woko.
Ka ibiketo giŋi marac i kom anyirana, nyo ka dok ibinyomo mon mukene, idodogi i kom anyirana, kadi ŋatti mo pe tye kwedwa, ber ipo ni Lubaŋa en aye caden i kin in ki an.”
Ci Laban dok owaco bot Yakobo ni, “Nen odur man, ki wir ma atyeko cibo i kin in ki an.
Odur man aye caden, ki wir bene en caden, an pe abikato ka ŋet odur man pi cito boti, in bene pe ibikato ka ŋet odur man ki wir man pi cito bota, ni pi tim marac.
Lubaŋa pa Abraim, Lubaŋa pa Nakor, Lubaŋa pa wongi, obed laŋolkop i kinwa.” Kit meno Yakobo okwoŋo kwoŋ ki nyiŋ Lubaŋa ma wonne Icaka lworo.
Yakobo otyero gitum i wi got, kun olwoŋo iye utmegine ducu ka camo cam kwede, ci gucamo gubuto kunnu i wi got.
Ka piny oru odiko con, Laban oa, onoto lem likwaye ki lem anyirane, olamo gum i komgi, ci opokke kwedgi odok i gaŋŋe.
Yakobo omedde ki wotte ci lumalaika pa Rwot guromo kwede.
Ka Yakobo onenogi, owacci, “Man mony pa Lubaŋa!” Mumiyo olwoŋo nyiŋ kabedo-nu ni Makanaim.
Yakobo ocwalo lukwena bot ominne Ecau ma tye i lobo Ceir, i lobo pa jo Edom.
Opwonyogi ni, “Wubiwaco bot laditta Ecau kit man: Laticci Yakobo owacci, ‘Doŋ atyeko bedo bot Laban abedo nio wa i kare-ni.
Atye ki twoni ki lwak kana, ki lwak lim, ki lwak opii ki lwak aŋeca; acwalo kwena boti laditta wek anoŋ pwoc mo ki tuŋ boti.’ ”
Ka lukwena gudwogo bot Yakobo, guwacce ni, “Wao bot omeru Ecau, en obebino ka jolo wii i yo, kacel ki jo miya aŋwen.”
Lworo omako Yakobo matek kome bene oryaŋŋe woko; ci opoko kin jo ma onoŋo gitye kwede, ki dyegi ki dyaŋi, ki kinaga, dul aryo,
kun tamo ni “Ka Ecau obino olwenyo i kom dul man acel-li otyeko woko, ci dul acel mudoŋ ca bibwot.”
Yakobo olego ni, “Ai Lubaŋa pa kwara Abraim, Lubaŋa pa wora Icaka, ai Rwot in ma yam iwacca ni, ‘Doŋ idok tuwu bot kakawu, an abitimi maber,’
an pe amyero kadi matidi mo ki mar meri ducu ma pe lokke, ki ada meri ducu ma inyuto i kom an laticci; pien con aŋolo kulu Jordan ma kun atye ki odoona keken, ci kombeddi doŋ apokke dul aryo kulu.
Alegi ni ilara ki i ciŋ omera, lara ki i ciŋ Ecau; pien alwore, gwok nyo obebino ka nekowa ducu mon ki litinogi.
Ento yam onoŋo iwaco ni, ‘Abitimi ber, abimiyo likwayi bedo macalo kweyo ma i dog nam, ma pe kwanne pi dwoŋŋe.’ ”
En obuto kenyo i nino meno, okwanyo dul lim mogo ma yam tye kwede ocwalo bot ominne Ecau,
megi dyegi miya aryo ki nyogi dyegi pyeraryo, megi romi miya aryo ki nyogi romi pyeraryo,
megi kinaga ma ginyeto cakgi pyeradek ki litinogi, megi dyaŋi pyeraŋwen ki twoni apar, megi kana pyeraryo ki twoni kana apar.
Otiŋo man ducu, omiyo i ciŋ luticce, kun gilekogi dul ki dul patpat. Ociko luticce ni, “Wun wukat i nyima, wek kinwu obed mabocoboco ka wutye ka lekogi.”
Ociko latel yo ni, “Ka omera Ecau oromo kwedi, ce openyi ni, ‘Wun jo pa aŋa? Wucito kwene? Lim man ma i nyimwu-ni pa aŋa?’
Ibiwacce ni, ‘Lim pa laticci Yakobo; gin aye mot ma ocwalo bot laditte Ecau; en bene pud odoŋ ceŋ i ŋewa.’ “
Omedde ki pwonyo dano me aryo ki me adekke, ki gin ducu ma gileko lim, ocikogi ni, “Wubiloko lok ma romrom bot Ecau ka wuromo kwede,
ka wubiwacce ni, ‘Dok bene laticci Yakobo aye odoŋ cen i ŋewa.’ ” Onoŋo otamo ni, “Wek akwe cwinye ki mot ma ocito anyim-mi, ci lacen olo abineno waŋe twal, dok en bene gwok doŋ bijola.”
Kit meno mot okwoŋo nyime, kun en kikome obuto i gony i dyewor meno. Yakobo olwenyo i Peniel
I dyewor meno en oa malo, ci okwanyo monne aryo, aŋecane aryo, kacel ki litinone apar wiye acel, owoto oŋolo kwedgi kulu Jabok i waŋ wat apara.
Okwanyogi, omiyo guŋolo kulu, kacel ki lim ma en tye kwede ducu.
Yakobo ka odoŋ kene, laco mo obino, ocako rette kwede nio wa kwarpiny.
Ka laco meno oneno ni pe doŋ etwero loyo Yakobo, ci otwomo awaŋ-macce; ci em Yakobo otuk owil woko lacuŋo ma en rette kwede.
Owacce ni, “Weka doŋ aciti, pien piny doŋ mito ru woko.” Ento Yakobo ogamo ni, “Pe abiweki, nio waŋ ma koŋ ilamma gum.”
En ogamo ni, “Nyiŋi kono aŋa?” En owacci, “Yakobo.”
Ci dok owacce ni, “Nia tin nyiŋi doŋ pe gibilwoŋo ni Yakobo, ento ni Icrael, pien ibedo ka lweny ki Lubaŋa, dok ki dano bene, ci imedo ki loyo.”
Yakobo dok openye ni, “Alegi ni itucca nyiŋi do.” En owacce ni, “Ipenyo nyiŋa kono piŋo?” Omiye gum ka kenyo.
Ci Yakobo ocako nyiŋ kabedo meno ni, Peniel, kun wacci, “Pien atyeko neno Lubaŋa waŋ ki waŋ, ento pud akwo gira aye.”
Ceŋ otucce i Peniel kun doŋ woto ma komo akoma pi eme ma otuk owil wokoni.
Omiyo wa i kare man Luicrael gikwero riŋo puc me bam ma tye i awaŋ-mac, pien Lubaŋa otwomo me Yakobo i ler awaŋ-mac.
Ka Yakobo otiŋo waŋe malo, ci oneno ka Ecau bino, kacel ki jone miya aŋwen. Ocako poko litino i kin Lea ki Lakeri ki bot aŋecane aryo-ni.
Ocwalo aŋeca ki litinogi anyim, ka dok Lea ki litinone, ka doŋ Lakeri ki Yucepu gucoko korgi ducu.
En kikome obolle, ocito anyim, kun woto ryebbe piny tyen abiro nio ka oo kwede cok bot ominne.
Ento Ecau otokke ki ŋwec, oriŋo ka mote, ci opoto okwako kore, ka omako ŋute, onoto leme, ci gucako koko.
Ka dok Ecau otiŋo waŋe malo, ci oneno lwak mon ki litinogi, owacci, “Maca kono jo mene ma gibino-ni?” Yakobo ogamo ni, “Meno aye gin litino ma Lubaŋa omiyo ki laticci pi kicane.”
Ka aŋeca gunyiko cok, kacel ki litinogi, ci guryebbe piny;
Lea bene kit meno kacel ki litinone ka gunyiko cok ci guryebbe piny; me agikkine Yucepu ki Lakeri gunyiko cok, gin bene guryebbe piny.
Ecau owacci, “Lwak man ma arwatte kwedgi ducu, te lokke aŋo?” Yakobo ogamo ni, “Wek anen maber-ber i nyim laditta.”
Ento Ecau owacci, “An atye ki ma roma, omera; wek lim man ducu gubed meri.”
Yakobo ogamo ni, “Aa, pe. Alegi ni, ka ineno an ayomo cwinyi, ci ber igam mot ma amiyi ki ciŋa-ni; pien ada, ka aneno waŋi, rom ki ma aneno waŋ Lubaŋa, pi kit cwiny maber ma ijola kwede-ni.
Alegi igam mot ma amiyo gikelo boti-ni, pien Lubaŋa doŋ onyuto kicane i koma, dok bene atye ki mera ma roma.” Obedo ka ride ki lok meno, nio ka oye, ogamo motte.
Lacen Ecau owacci, “Wek doŋ wanywaku yo kacel, kun atelo nyimi.”

Ento Yakobo ogamo ni, “Laditta, iŋeyo ni litino pud peya guteggi, dok atye ka gwoko romi ki dyaŋi ma pud gidoto litinogi; ka wamiyogi wot malac, bibwoyogi woko, kadi bed pi nino acel, lim ducu gibito woko.
Wek in laditta iwot, icit anyim i nyim laticci, kun an alubo kori motmot, muporo wot pa lim mutella yo, ki wot pa litino, nio ka abio boti i Ceir.”
Ecau ogamo ni, “Wek awek boti jo mogo ma abino kwedgi-ni.” Ento en owacci, “Gimitte piŋo? Laditta, tima ber, wek doŋ obed kit meno.”
Kumeno Ecau ocako wot i nino meno me dok i Ceir.
Yakobo owoto odok mere tuŋ Cukot, ogero ode pire kene dok oguro dwol dyaŋine. Mumiyo nyiŋ kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni Cukot.
Lacen Yakobo oo ki kuc i gaŋ me Cekem, ma tye i lobo Kanaan, kun oa ki i Paddan-aram; oguro kemane i nyim gaŋ.
Dul-latin lobo ma oguro iye kema-ni, owilo ki bot litino pa Kamor, ma won Cekem, ki wellim ma romo miya acel.
Ocano keno tyer kunnu, ci olwoŋo ni El-Eloe-Icrael.
Dina nya pa Lea, ma onywalo ki Yakobo, ocito ka limo mon ma i lobo meno.
Cekem wod pa Kamor ma Lakiv, laker me lobo meno, ka onene, ci omake tektek obuto kwede, omiye lewic.
Cwinye omaro Dina nya pa Yakobo; omaro nyako, kun loko kwede mot mupye.
Cekem oloko ki wonne Kamor ni, “Nyomma nyako man, obed dakona.”
Yakobo owinyo ni otyeko ronyo nyare Dina; ento onoŋo awobene gitye ki limme i olet. Yakobo odiyo cwinye, oliŋ gire mot, nio ka gudwogo.
Kamor won Cekem ocito bot Yakobo ka penyo keny.
Ka awobe pa Yakobo guwinyo lok meno, gua ki i olet, gudwogo, ci gukeco, kiniga omakogi, pien otimo gin ma pe myero i Icrael, pi buta ki nya pa Yakobo, pien kit tim macalo meno pe myero otimme.
Kamor oloko kwedgi kun waco ni, “Tipo kom woda doŋ omaro nyawu; alegowu, wuwek en onyom nyawu, obed dakone.
Wek nyomme obed i kinwa kwedwu; wumi anyirawu botwa, wun bene wunyom anyirawa, wuter.
Wun wubibedo kwedwa, wubibedo i lobo-ni macalo wumito; wubed iye wucat iye wilwu, wek wulim iye lim.”
Cekem bene owaco kit meno bot won nyako ki omegine, ni, “Ber wujol kennya, abikelo botwu lim ducu ma wuŋolla.
Wuŋolla wel lim kit ma wumito ducu ki me ayal, abikolo lim kit ma wubiwacca; ento wumiya anyom nyako-ni obed dakona.”
Awobe pa Yakobo gugamo dog Cekem ki wonne Kamor kun gibwologi abwola, pien oronyo lamingi Dina.
Guwaco botgi ni, “Pe watwero tiyo iye gin mo, ento miyo laminwa bot dano ma pe giliro, meno bikelo lewic i komwa.
Tye yo acel keken; ka otimme, ci miyo waye, en ene: ka wudoko macalo wan, ka dano acel acel ma laco i kinwu olirre.
Miyo wan doŋ wabimiyowu anyirawa, ki wan bene doŋ wabinyomo anyirawu; ci doŋ wabibedo i kinwu macalo wat acel.
Ento ka pe wuwinyo lokwa, ka wukwero Lirre, ci wakwanyo nyawa, waa, wacito giwa.”
Lokgi oyomo cwiny Kamor ki wode Cekem.
Latin awobi orune ka timo woko cut, pien onoŋo cwinye yom i kom nya pa Yakobo. Onoŋo yam giwore makato jo ducu ma i ot pa wonne.
Kit meno Kamor ki wode Cekem gucito i dog gaŋgi, ci guwaco bot jo me gaŋgi ni,
“Jo man gimer kwedwa; waweku gin gubed i lobo, gucat wilgi iye; nen, lobo-ni tye malac ma romogi; wuwek wanyom anyiragi, wek wami gin bene gunyom anyirawa.
Tye lok acel ma bimiyo giye bedo i kinwa, en aye bedo wat acel, ka laco acel acel i kinwa bilirre, kit macalo gin gilirre.
Pe limgi, ki lonyogi ki lwak lee ma tye i ciŋgi ducu gibidoko limwa? Ber waye lokgi wek gubed kwedwa.”
Ci jo ducu ma guwok ki i dog gaŋ guwinyo lok pa Kamor ki wode Cekem; co ducu ki acel acel gulirre, lwak ducu ma guwok ki i dog gaŋ meno.
Ka nino okato adek, ma doŋ bur okwok, ci awobe pa Yakobo aryo, Cimeon ki Levi, omegi Dina, gukwanyo pala lucwan, gucito, guturo ki donyo i gaŋ ma pe wegine giŋeyo, ci guneko co woko ducu.
Ka guneko Kamor ki wode Cekem ki pala lucwan, ci gukwanyo Dina woko ki i ot pa Cekem, gucito kwede.
Awobe pa Yakobo gucorre i gaŋ pa luto, guyako iye jamigi pi ronyo lamingi.
Guyako dyegigi ki dyaŋigi, ki lwak kana, ki jami ducu ma tye i gaŋ ki ma tye i potti bene.
Guyako lwak lonyogi ducu, ki litinogi ducu ki mon megi, ki jami ma i odigi ducu, gutero matwal.

Ci Yakobo owaco bot Cimeon ki Levi ni, “Wun wukelo ayela i koma, wumiyo nyiŋa odoko ŋwe lituny i kin wegi lobo-ni, Lukanaan ki Luperiji. An lwakka nok mo, ka ce gucokke kacel me lweny kweda, gibityeka woko liweŋ, an kacel ki oda ducu.”
Ento gugamo ni, “Myero doŋ gubed ki laminwa macalo lakwele bo?”
Lubaŋa owaco bot Yakobo ni, “A woko icit i Betel, wek ibed kunnu; dok ican keno tyer kunnu ka ma yam an anen iye boti i kare ma iriŋo ilwi woko ki bot omeru Ecau.”
Omiyo Yakobo owaco bot jo ma i ode ki jo ducu ma gibedo bote ni, “Wubol lwak cal lubaŋa pa lurok ma wutye kwedgi i kinwu-ni, wulonnye kenwu, wulok ginarukawu;
ka doŋ waayu, wacitu woko wa i Betel, wek acit acan keno tyer pi Lubaŋa ma yam ogamo doga i nino ma yam can odiŋani, ma obedo kweda i kabedo ducu ma awoto iye.”
Gumiyo ki Yakobo cal ducu, ki agit ma noŋo tye i itgi bene; ci cal lubaŋa pa lurok ma gitye kwede Yakobo oyikogi piny i te yat kworo ma yam tye cok ki Cekem.
Ka gitye ka wot, lworo ma oa ki bot Lubaŋa opoto i kom wegi gaŋi ma tye cok kwedgi, omiyo pe gulubo kor awobe pa Yakobo.
Yakobo otiro i Luj ma en aye Betel, ma tye i lobo Kanaan, en kacel ki lwak dano ducu ma yam gitye kwede.
Ocano keno tyer kunnu, olwoŋo nyiŋ kabedo meno ni El-betel pien onoŋo Lubaŋa yam onen iye bote i kare ma olwi oriŋo woko ki bot ominne.
Debola lapidi pa Labeka oto woko, ci giyike i te yat kworo ma i ŋet Betel; mumiyo nyiŋ kabedo meno gilwoŋo ni Alon-bakut.
Lubaŋa dok onyutte bot Yakobo i kare ma en oa ki i Paddan-aram, ci omiye gum.
Lubaŋa owacce ni, “Nyiŋi Yakobo; pe dok gibilwoŋo nyiŋi ni Yakobo, ento nyiŋi doŋ bibedo Icrael.” Omiyo nyiŋe odoko Icrael.
Lubaŋa dok owacce ni, “An Lubaŋa Matwero-ducu; nywal, inya; rok ki lwak rok mapol bia i komi, ki luker bene gibia ki i komi.
Lobo ma yam amiyo ki Abraim ki Icaka abimiyo boti, ka dok abimiyo lobo bot likwayi ma gibilubi.”
Lubaŋa ocako a ki i kabedo ka ma yam oloko iye kwede-ni odok malo.
Ci Yakobo ocibo wii i kabedo ka ma oloko iye kwede-ni, ocibo iye wir got; oonyo gityer amata i keme, ka oliyo moo i kome.
Yakobo ocako nyiŋ kabedo ma Lubaŋa oloko iye kwede-ni ni Betel.
Gumedde ki wot nia ki i Betel: i kare ma pud Eprat kiborbor, mwoc Ogoyo Lakeri, ci nyodone obedo tek.
Ka doŋ nyodone obedo tek, dako lacolo owacce ni, “Pe ilwor; tin doki ibinywalo latin laco mukene.”
I kare ma en to ma cwinye cok ka tum, ocako nyiŋ latinne ni. Benoni; ento wonne ocako nyiŋe ni Benjamin.
Lakeri oto woko kit meno, ci giyike i yo ma cito Eprat, ma en aye Beterekem.
Yakobo ocibo wir got i wi lyel pa Lakeri; meno wir lyel pa Lakeri ma pud tye ocuŋ kunnu nio wa i kare man.
Icrael omedde ki wotte, ogony i ŋe lubele me Eder ma wiye ocudo malo.
I kare ma Icrael tye i lobo meno, ci wode Reuben otimo caro, obuto ki ci-wonne Bila ma aŋeca; ci wonne owinyo pire bene. Yakobo yam tye ki awobene apar wiye aryo.
Litino awobe pa Lea gin aye Reuben, latin kayo pa Yakobo, Cimeon, Levi, Juda, Icakar ki Jabulon.
Litino awobe pa Lakeri gin aye Yucepu ki Benjamin.
Litino awobe pa Bila, aŋeca: pa Lakeri, gin aye Dan ki Naputali.
Litino awobe pa Jilpa, aŋeca pa Lea, gin aye Gad ki Acer. Meno gin aye litino awobe pa Yakobo ma ginywalogi i Paddan-aram.
Yakobo obino bot wonne Icaka i Mamre, i Kiriat-arba, en aye Kebron ka ma yam Abraim ki Icaka gubedo iye.
Icaka yam ori wi lobo mwaka miya acel ki pyeraboro.
Icaka oomo cwinye me agikkine, oto woko ci odok oto, lutugi, dano muteggi, ma doŋ oti; ci awobene Ecau ki Yakobo guyiko kome.
Man-aye likwayo pa Ecau, en Edom.
Ecau onyomo anyira Kanaan: Ada nya pa Elon Lakit, Okolibama nya pa Ana, wod pa Jibeon Lakiv,
ki Bacemat nya pa Icmael, lamin Nebayot.
Ada onywalo ki Ecau Erifaji; Bacemat onywalo Reuel;
ki Okolibama onywalo Jeuc, Jalam ki Kora; meno aye litino awobe ma ginywalo ki Ecau i lobo Kanaan.

Ecau otero monne ki litino awobene ki anyirane, ki lwak jo ducu ma en tye kwede, ki limme, lee mere ducu ki lonyone ducu ma olimogi ki i lobo Kanaan, odak kwedgi i lobo mukene kun opokke ki ominne Yakobo.
Onoŋo gin ducu gitye ki lim madwoŋ, ma pe doŋ romogi bedo kacel: pien lobo ma onoŋo gibedo iye pe romo me kwayo limgi,
Omiyo Ecau odak obedo i lobo godi me Ceir; Ecau en aye Edom.
Likwayo pa Ecau won jo Edom ma i lobo godi me Ceir gin ene.
Man aye nyiŋ litino awobe pa Ecau: Erifaji wod pa Ada ma, dako pa Ecau, ki Reuel wod pa Bacemat dako pa Ecau.
Litino awobe pa Erifaji gin Teman Omar Jepo, Gatam ki Kenaj.
Timna yam en dako pa Erifaji, wod pa Ecau, ma aŋeca; onywalo Amalek ki Erifaji. Man gin aye litino awobe pa Ada, dako pa Ecau.
Man gin aye litino awobe pa Reuel: Nakat, Jera Cama ki Mija. Man aye litino awobe pa Bacemat dako pa Ecau.
Man aye litino awobe pa Okolibama nya pa Ana wod pa Jibeon, dako pa Ecau; onywalo ki Ecau awobe magi: Jeuc, Jalam ki Kora.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Ecau ma rwodi. Litino awobe pa Erifaji latin ka yo pa Ecau gin ene: rwot Teman rwot Omar, rwot Jepo, rwot Kenaj:
rwot Kora, rwot Gatam rwot Amalek; magi aye rwodi pa Erifaji ma i lobo Edom; gin aye awobe pa Ada.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Reuel wod pa Ecau: rwot Nakat, rwot Jera rwot Cama ki rwot Mija; meno aye rwodi pa Reuel ma i lobo Edom; gin aye litino awobe pa Bacemat, dako pa Ecau.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Okilibama dako pa Ecau: rwot Jeuc rwot Jalam ki rwot Kora: meno gin aye rwodi ma Okolibama nya pa Ana, dako pa Ecau, onywalo.
Gin aye litino awobe pa Ecau, en aye Edom; meno aye gin rwodigi.
Magi aye awobe pa Ceir Lakori, ma gin wegi lobo-nu: Lotan, Cobal, Jibeon, Ana,
Dicon, Ejer ki Dican; magi aye rwodi pa jo Kori, litino awobe pa Ceir ma i lobo Edom.
Litino awobe pa Lotan gin aye Kori ki Eman; ki lamin Lotan en Timna.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Cobal: Alvan, Manakat, Ebal, Cepo ki Onam.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Jibeon: Aiya, ki Ana; en aye Ana ma yam onoŋo waŋ pii amuro ma tye i tim, i kare ma en tye ka kwayo lwak kana pa wonne Jibeon.
Magi aye Litino pa Ana: Dicon ki Okolibama, nya pa Ana.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Dicon: Kemdan, Eciban, Itran ki Keran.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Ejer: Bilan, Jaavan ki Akan.
Magi aye litino awobe pa Dican: Uj ki Aran.
Magi aye rwodi pa jo Kori: rwot Lotan, rwot Cobal, rwot Jibeon, rwot Ana,
rwot Dicon, rwot Ejer ki rwot Dican; meno aye rwodi pa jo Koti, kit ma calo kakagi tye kwede i lobo Ceir.
Magi aye luker ma guloyo lobo Edom, ma onoŋo pud peya kabaka mo oloyo jo Icrael.
Bela wod pa Beor onoŋo loyo Edom, nyiŋ gaŋ kalle gilwoŋo ni Dinkaba.
Ka Bela oto, ci Jobab wod pa Jera me Bojra oleyo ka tyene.
Ka Jobab oto, ci Kucam mua ki i lobo pa jo Teman oleyo ka tyene.
Ka Kucam oto, ci Adad wod pa Bedad oleyo ka tyene. En con olwenyo, oloyo jo Midian ma gitye i lobo Moab; nyiŋ gaŋ kalle gilwoŋo Avit.
Ka Adad oto ci Camla me Macireka oleyo ka tyene.
Ka Camla oto, ci Caul me Rekobot ma tye i dog kulu Euprate oleyo ka tyene.
Ka Caul oto, ci Baal-kanan wod pa Akbor oleyo ka tyene.
Ka Baal-kanan wod pa Akbor oto, ci Kadar oleyo ka tyene; nyiŋ gaŋ kalle gilwoŋo Pau. Nyiŋ dakone Meketabel, nya pa Matred, nya pa Mejakab.
Magi aye nyiŋ rwodi ma tuŋ bot Ecau, macalo doggolagi tye kwede, ki kabedogi, ma lubo nyiŋgi: rwot Timna, rwot Alva, rwot Jetet,
rwot Okolibama rwot. Ela rwot Pinon,
rwot Kenaj, rwot Teman, rwot Mibjar,
rwot Magdiel ki rwot Iram; magi aye rwodi pa jo Edom, en aye Ecau, ma kwaro pa jo Edom, kit ma yam gibedo kwede i kabedogi, i lobo ma odoko megi.
Yakobo obedo i lobo ma yam koŋ wonne obedo iye-ni, lobo me Kanaan.

Man aye lok me tekwaro pa Yakobo. Ka Yucepu doŋ ditte oromo mwaka apar wiye abiro, onoŋo doŋ kwayo lim kacel ki omege; en obedo ki litino awobe pa Bila ki Jilpa, mon pa wonne; Yucepu okelo lok maraco i komgi bot wongi.
Yakobo onoŋo maro Yucepu makato litinone ducu pien onoŋo en latin ma ginywalo ka wi tiyone; okwone kanyi mabor ma bade boco.
Ento ka omegine guneno ni wongi maro en makato gin ducu, cwinygi ocako kwere woko, pe gitwero lok kwede maber.
Ka Yucepu oleko lek, ci otito bot omegine, ci gumedde ameda ki kwere.
En otito botgi ni, “Koŋ wuwiny kit lek ma aleko-ni:
nen ba, i kare ma wabedo ka tweyo larita i poto, ci nen, laritana oa malo ocuŋ atir; ci laritawu gugurre, gurume dyere, ka giryebbe piny bot laritana.”
Omegine gugamo ni, “In ada ibiloyowa? In aye doŋ ibiloyo wiwa?” Gumedde ki kwere doŋ marac pi lekke ki pi lokke.
Dok oleko lek mukene, dok otito ki omegine aye, kun wacci, “Nenu ba, dok aleko lek mukene aye. Nen, ceŋ ki dwe ki lakalatwe apar wiye acel gubedo ka ryebbe piny i nyima.”
Ka otito bot wonne ki bot omegine, wonne ocoke, ojuke matek, kun wacce ni, “Meno kit lek aŋo ma ileko kumene-ni? An ki meni ki omegini wabibino, ci wapoto waryebbe piny i nyimi ada?”
Nyeko omako omegine i kome ento wonne okano lok meno i cwinye. Gicato Yucepu i Ejipt
Ka omegine gucito ka kwayo lim pa wongi ma cok ki Cekem,
ci Icrael owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Omegini pe gitye ka kwat i ŋet Cekem? Bin wek aori icit botgi.” En ogamo doge ni, “An a ene”.
Ci owacce ni, “Koŋ, icinen ka omegini gitye maber, kacel ki lim bene, ka idwokka lok doki.” Ka ocwale nia ki i nota me Kebron, ci ocito wa i Cekem.
Laco mo onoŋe ka woto juŋŋe atata i olet; laco meno openye ni, “In ibeyenyo aŋo?”
En ogamo ni, “Abeyenyo omegina. Alegi ititta ka ma gitye iye ka kwayo limgi.”
Laco meno owacce ni, “Doŋ gutyeko a woko, pien awinyo ka giwaco ni, ‘Wacitu wa i Dotan’” Yucepu ocako lubo kor omegine, ka onoŋogi i Dotan.
Ka gunene ki ka mabor, ma onoŋo peya oo botgi cok, ci guyubo lok i kome me neke,
kun giloko kekengi ni, “Lalek eno bino-nu.
Wubin tin wa neke woko, wek wabole i bur mo kany; ci wabitito ni, ‘ŋuu mo aye omake, omwode woko’, wek wanen kit ma lekke-nu bicobbe kwede.”
Reuben owinyo yub meno, ci olare ki i ciŋgi, kun wacci, “Pe wan aye waneke.”
Reuben owacogi dok ni, “Pe giony remone mo; wubole woko i bur man ma tye i tim kany, ento pe wuket ciŋwu i kome.” Onoŋo en oyubbe me kwanye woko ki i ciŋgi pi dwoke bot wonne.
Ka Yucepu oo bot omegine, ci gupoto i kome, gulunyo boŋo kanyine woko, kanyi mabor ma bade boco ma onoŋo oruko-ni;
ci gumake, gutere gubole woko i bur. Bur meno onoŋo pii pe iye.
Lacen gubedo piny ka cam; ka gutiŋo wangi, ci guneno lwak jo Icmael ma gua i Gilead, ki lwak kinaga ma gutiŋo yec odok, moo yat too ki murra, ma giwoto gicito kwede i Ejipt.
Juda dok owaco ki omegine ni, “Konyo aŋo ka waneko ominwa dok wamuŋo tone woko?
Wubin wek wacatu en bot jo Icmael, pe wan aye waneke ki ciŋwa, pien en ominwa, remowa kikome.” Ci omegine guworo doge.
Jo Midian ma lucatwil gubino kenyo; ci guywayo Yucepu woko ki i bur, gucate woko bot jo Icmael, kun giwile ki cekel me ryal pyeraryo; ci gutero Yucepu wa i Ejipt.
Ka Reuben odwogo i dog bur, ci oneno Yucepu doŋ pe i bur, ci cwinye ocwer ocako yeco boŋone woko.
Ka odok cen bot omegine, owacogi ni “Awobi-ni doŋ pe do; man abidok kwene ba?”
Ka gukwanyo kanyi pa Yucepu, ci guneko dyel, ka guluto kanyi i remo;
ka gukelo kanyi mabor ma bade boco bot wongi, kun giwaco ni, “Wan wanoŋo man; koŋ iŋi, ka nyo kanyi pa wodi onyo pe.”
Ka oŋiyo, ci owacci, “Man kanyi pa woda do; ŋuu doŋ omwode woko do; adada Yucepu doŋ ŋuu okido woko matitino do.”
Yakobo bene cwinye ocwer, ocako yeco boŋone, ci otweyo boŋo cola i pyere, obedo ka koko wode pi kare malac.
Awobene ducu ki anyirane gua malo gucito ka kweyo cwinye; okwero ni pe gikwe cwinye, kun wacci, “Aa pe, abilubo kor latinna i lyel ki koko.” Wonne obedo ka koke kit meno.
Ci jo Midian gucato Yucepu woko i Ejipt bot Potipar, ladit tic pa Parao, ma loyo askari Lukur-piny.
I kare meno Juda oa woko ki bot omegine, ocito odak bot laco mo ma i Adulam, ma nyiŋe Kira.
Juda oneno nya pa Lakanaan mo ma nyiŋe Cua; ci onyomo, ka obedo kwede.
Ci ogamo ic, onywalo latin laco, wonne ocako nyiŋe Er.
Dako dok ogamo, onywalo latin laco, ocako nyiŋe Onan.
Dok ogamo ic aye, onywalo latin laco, ocako nyiŋe Cela, Latin meno en onywalo i Kejib.
Juda onyomo nyako ma nyiŋe Tamar ki wode Er ma latin kayone.
Ento Er latin kayo pa Juda yam onoŋo dano marac i nyim Rwot, ci Rwot oneke woko.
Ci Juda owaco bot Onan ni, “Dony i wi ci-omeru, ci ibed kwede macalo won ot, wek inywal kwede wi omeru.”
Ento Onan oŋeyo ni litino pe bibedo mere; pi meno ka odonyo i wi ci-ominne, ci onyeto kodine piny, wek pe enywal kwede wi ominne.
Gin ma otimo pe oyomo cwiny Rwot, ci oneke woko bene.

Juda dok owaco bot ci-wode Tamar ni, “Koŋ doŋ ibed macalo daa-to i ot pa woru, nio waŋ ma woda Cela bidoŋo”, pien onoŋo lworo ni gwok bito woko, macalo omegine. Kit meno Tamar odok obedo i ot pa wonne.
Ka kare okato, ci dako pa Juda ma nya pa Cua-ni oto woko. Ka cwiny Juda doŋ opye, ci ocito i Timna bor luŋol yer romine, onywako yo ki lareme Kira ma Laadulam.
Ka gitito bot Tamar ni, “Kwaru okato obecito i Timna ka ŋolo yer rom ine”,

ci olunyo boŋo cola me dalako woko, ka oumme ki kitambara, odwalo ki kome woko ducu, ka ocito obedo kwede i dogcel me Enaim, ma okemo yo me Timna; pien onoŋo oneno ni kadi bed Cela doŋ oteggi, ento peya gimiye ni olake.
Ka Juda onene, ci otamo ni gwok dako lakwele mo, pien onoŋo en oumo waŋe woko ducu.
Ka ocito bote ka ma obedo iye i ŋet yo, owacce ni, “Bin wek abed kwedi,” kun pe ŋeyo ni ci-wode. En ogamo ni, “Ibimiya gin aŋo kono, ka wek ibin ibed kweda?”
En odok iye ni, “Abikwanyo latin dyel ki i kin dyegina, acwalli.” Dako-nu ogamo ni, “Ibijeŋo gin aŋo bota, ka doŋ ibicwalla?”
Ogamo ni, “In imito ajeŋŋi gin aŋo?” En odok iye ni, “Agit meri, ki tolli, ki odooni ma tye i ciŋi-ni.” Ci otiŋo omiyogi ducu bote, ka odonyo obedo kwede, ci dako-nu oyac kwede.
Dako oa okato ocito gire woko, olunyo boŋo kitambara ma oumme kwede-ni, ka doŋ oruko boŋo cola me dalako.
Ka Juda ocwalo La-adulam ma lareme pi terre latin dyel, wek odwokke jami ma yam ojeŋo bot dako-nu, pe omedo ki noŋo kome.
Obedo ka penyo jo ma i kabedo-nu ni, “Dako mo ma lakwele-ni tye kwene, ma onoŋo yam bedo i ŋet yo Enaim?” Guwacce ni, “Lakwele mo pe obedo kany.”
Ka odok cen bot Juda, ci owacce ni, “Pe amedo ki noŋo dako-nu; ki jo ma i kabedo meno bene guwacci, ‘Lakwele mo pe yam obedo kunnu.’ “
Juda ogamo ni, “Wek doŋ oter jami-nu obed mere, giwek nyerowa; nen, acwalo latin dyel man, ci noŋo kome aye oloyi.”
Ka dwe adek okato, ci gitito ki Juda ni, “Ci-wodi Tamar obedo ka timme kwele kwele, ci doŋ oyac woko ki tim kwelene-ni.” Juda owacci, “Wukele woko, wek giwaŋe woko.”
Ka gitye ka kele woko, ci en ocwalo lok bot kwarone, ni “Won jami man en aye ayac kwede.” Dok onwoyo aye ni, “Alegi ni iŋigi. Agit, ki tol ki odoo-nu jami pa aŋa kaa?”
Juda oŋiyogi, ci otuco kun waco ni, “Dako man kite atir makata woko, pien pe amedo ki miyo en bot woda Cela.” Pe bene omedo ki bedo kwede.
Ka kare me gonnyene oromo, ci onen ni litino rudi tye i iye.
Ka mwoc doŋ ogoye, latin ocwalo ciŋe woko, ci lacolo otweyo uci makwar i ciŋe, kun wacci, “Man aye okwoŋo katti woko.”
Ka doŋ oŋunyo ciŋe, odwoko cen, nen, ominne aye dok okatti woko, ci dako-nu owacci, “In doŋ ituro ki baro dye ic, ikatti woko niŋniŋ?” Mumiyo gicako nyiŋe Perej.
Ka lacen ominne dok ginywalo kun uci makwar tye i ciŋe; ci gicako nyiŋe jera.
Gitero Yucepu woko i Ejipt, ci Potipar ladit tic pa Parao, ma loyo askari lukurpiny, ma Laejipt, owilo en woko ki bot jo Icmael ma gutere kunnu-ni.
Rwot yam tye ki Yucepu, ci odoko lakomegum; ocako bedo gire i ot pa laditte ma Laejipt;
ci laditte bene oneno ni Rwot tye kwede, pien Rwot omiyo gin ducu ma en tiyo bedo maber.
Cwiny Potipar obedo, yom i kom Yucepu, ci odoko laticce. Ocako kete obedo ladit ma loyo ode ki jamine ducu.

Nia i kare meno ma okete obedo ladit ma loyo ode, ki lalo jamine ducu, Rwot ocako miyo gum obedo i ot pa Laejipt meno pi Yucepu; gum pa Rwot opoto i kom jami ma yam tyekwede ducu, ma i ot ki ma i poto-gu.
Ci Potipar omiyo jami ducu i te loc pa Yucepu; pi bedo kwede omiyo doŋ pe paro gin mo, kono pi cam keken ma en camo-ni. Onoŋo Yucepu nen mabulobulo, dok mwonya matek.
Lacen dako pa laditte cwinye ocako pyette i kom Yucepu, ci owacce ni, “Wabut kwedi.”
Ento en okwero woko, ci owaco bot ci-laditte ni, “Nen ba, pi bedona kany omiyo laditta pe doŋ paro pi gin mo ma tye i ot-ti, dok otyeko keto gin ducu ma etye kwede i ciŋa.

En pe doŋ tye ki dit makato an i ot man, pe tye gin mo ma dok okano ma peya omiyo i ciŋa, kono in keken, pien in i dakone. An dok acorre ka tiyo bal madit marac kuman niŋniŋ, kun atimo wa bal i kom Lubaŋa kulu?”
Kadi bed dako meno obedo ka bito Yucepu jwijwi, pe omedo ki winyo lokke, pe oye buto kwede, kadi bedo kwede.
Ento ka nino mo acel owec, ma, onoŋo laco mo pe i ot, ka Yucepu odonyo i ot ka tiyo ticce,
ci dako-nu omake ki boŋone, kun wacci, “But kweda.” Ento Yucepu omwomme oweko boŋone i ciŋe, okato gire woko ki i ot.
Ka dako-nu oneno en oweko boŋone i ciŋe, omwomme gire oka-to woko ki i ot,
ci olwoŋo co ma gibedo i ode, ci otittigi ni, “Nenu, ladit-ti okelo Laibru-ni kany me nywarowa; obino bota i ot ni ebut kweda kulu, ci atokke adaŋŋe ki koko matek.
Ka oneno ni atiŋo dwana malo kun agorre matek ki koko, ci otenyo ginarukane bota, ci omwomme oka-to woko ki i ot.”
Ci opyelo boŋone ka ŋete nio ka won ot odwogo paco.
Otitte kit lok acel-lu, kun waco ni, “Opii Laibru-ni ma ikelo i kinwa obino bota i ot ka nywara;
ento ka atiŋo dwana oyotoyot kun adaŋŋe, ci oweko ginarukane bota, omwomme gire woko ki i ot.”
Ka Potipar owinyo lok ma dakone olokke, ni, “Man en aye kit ma opiini otima kwede”, ci kiniga omake matek mada.
Ocako mako Yucepu, oketo i mabuc, i kabedo ma gitweyo iye lumabuc pa kabaka, ci obedo i mabuc kunnu.
Ento Rwot onoŋo tye ki Yucepu, ci onyutte mar mere ma pe lokke, ci omiyo en oyomo cwiny lagwok ot mabuc.
Lagwok mabuc omiyo twer ki Yucepu me gwoko lumabuc ducu ma gitye i mabuc; gin ducu ma gitiyo kunnu, en aye loyo.
Lagwok ot mabuc pe doŋ tamo pi gin mo ma oketo i ciŋ Yucepu, pien onoŋo Rwot tye kwede; gin ducu ma en tiyo, Rwot omiyo iye gum.
Ka kare okato, latyer koŋo vino pa kabaka me Ejipt ki lated mugatine gubalo i nyime.
Kiniga omako Parao i kom ludito ticce aryo-nu, ladit latyer koŋo vino ki ladit me tedo mugati,
ci oketogi i ot pa ladit ma loyo askari lukur-piny po gwokogi, i ot mabuc ma Yucepu bene gitweye iye-ni.
Ladit ma loyo askari lukur-piny oketogi i ciŋ Yucepu, en okurogi; ka gitweyogi i ot kol kare mo.
Ci guleko lek i nino acel, latyer koŋo vino ki lated mugati pa kabaka me Ejipt, ma gitweyogi i ot mabuc; ŋat acel acel oleko gire lekke, kun lek acel acel tye ki tyen lokke.
Ka Yucepu obino botgi odiko, ci onenogi kun gitye ki cwercwiny.
Ci openyo ludito tic aryo pa Parao ma gitye kwede i ot kol i ot pa laditte, ni, “Tin waŋwu oballe woko piŋo?”
Gugamo ni, “Tin waleko lek, ci pe tye dano mo ma gonyowa te lekke.” Yucepu owacogi ni, “Pe Lubaŋa gire aye lagony tere? Koŋ wutitta lekke mono.”
Ci latyer koŋo vino ocako tito lekke bot Yucepu, kun wacce ni, “I waŋ lekka onoŋo olok tye i nyima,
olok onoŋo tye ki jaŋe adek; ka pud oluro me keto: ture, ci onyak, olugo ocek woko.
Ka amako kikopo pa Parao i ciŋa, ci aŋolo nyige, abiyo i kikopo, ka amiyo kikopo i ciŋ Parao.”
Yucepu ogamo, owacce ni, “Man aye te lekke: jaŋe adek-ki, meno nino adek;
i nino me adekke Parao bitiŋi ci dwoki i dog ticci, ci dok ibimiyo kikopo pa Parao i ciŋe kit macon ca, kit macalo con i kare ma in latyer koŋo vinone.
Ento ber ipo pira ka doŋ idok i dog ticci; alegi ni in bene itima ber do, itit pira bot Parao, wek gigonya woko ki i ot man.
Pien yam gikwala akwala ki i lobo pa jo Ibru; man bene dok giketa kany i ot kol noŋo ma pe abalo gin mo.”
Ka ladit me tedo mugati oneno ni gigonyo te lek maber, en owaco ki Yucepu ni, “An bene onoŋo aleko lekka: onoŋo adodo aduku adek i wiya.
I aduku mamalone ca onoŋo tye iye lwak kit gin ma gitedo ducu pi Parao, ento winyo obedo ka camogi woko ki i aduku ma tye i wiya-ni.”
Yucepu ogamo ni, “Man aye te lekke: aduku adek en aye nino adek;
i nino me adekke Parao bitiŋi malo, ci biŋabi i kom yat, ka winyo gibicamo riŋo komi woko.”
Ka nino adek oromo, en aye nino ma ginywalo iye Parao, ci otedo karama ki luticce ducu, ci Parao okelo ladit latyer kono yino kacel ki ladit lated mugati i nyim luticce.
Odwoko ladit latyer koŋo vino i dog ticce me tyero koŋo vino, ci otiŋo kikopo pa Parao omiyo i ciŋe;
ento oŋabo: ladit lated mugati malo i kom yat kit ma nene Yucepu ogonyo kwede te lekgi.
Ento ladit latyer koŋo vino pe omedo ki po pi Yucepu, wiye owil woko i kome matwal.
Ka mwaka okato aryo kulu, Parao oleko lek ni onoŋo ecuŋ i ŋet kulu Nail,
ci nen, dyaŋi abiro ma komgi pilpil ma gucwe, gubedo ka camo lum tiro.
Dyaŋi mukene abiro dok gukatti woko ki i kulu Nail ma komgi omok, gujony woko liŋok, ma gulubo korgi, ka gucuŋ ka ŋet dyaŋi meno, ma gitye i ŋet kulu Nail.
Dyaŋi ma komgi omok, ma gujony woko liŋok-ki gucamo dyaŋi ma komgi pilpil mucwe-ni woko. Ci Parao oco woko ki i waŋ nino.
Ka dok onino, ci dok oleko lek mukene me aryone, oneno wit kal abiro ma ocek oluŋŋe, mabeco, ma gujany i kom tyen kai acel.
Dok i ŋegi oneno wit kal abiro ma gulot gujany ma walgi atati, ma gubwarre woko pi yamo malyet mua ki tuŋ wokceŋ.
Ci wite abiro ma waŋgi atati-ni gumwonyo wit kal ma ocek oluŋŋe, ma waŋgi ŋaraŋara-ni woko. Ka Parao dok oco woko ki i waŋ nino, onoŋo ni dok eleko lek aye.
Cwinye obedo ka cwer odiko con; ci ocwalo kwena olwoŋo lutyet ki luryeko ma i Ejipt ducu. Parao otitogi lekke, ento ŋat mo pe onen ma otwero gonyo ki Parao te lekke.
Ladit latyer koŋo vino owaco ki Parao ni, “Apo rocca tin.
I kare ma Parao okeco i kom luticce, ci otweya i ot kol kacel ki ladit lated mugati i ot pa ladit ma loyo askari lukur-piny,
wan ducu waleko lek i dyewor acel-lu, en ki an, waleko lek ma tyen lokgi patpat.
Latin Ibru mo onoŋo tye kwedwa, ma obedo latic pa ladit ma loyo askari lukurpiny. Ka yam watitte, ci ogonyowa te lekwa, kun gonyo te lek pa ŋat acel acel kit ma lekke tye kwede.
Kit ma en ogonyo te Lekwa, ci otimme kumeno; an gidwoka i dog ticca, ento lated mugati giŋabo malo i kom yat.”
Ci Parao ocwalo kwena gilwoŋo Yucepu, gikelo woko aruya ki i ot kol; olyelo wiye, ka oloko boŋone, ci ocito odonyo bot Parao.
Parao owaco bot Yucepu ni, “An onoŋo aleko lek, ento ŋatti mo pe onoŋŋe ma twero gonnya te lekke; abedo ka winyo ka giloko i komi ni ka iwinyo lek mo, ci itwero gonyo tere.”
Yucepu ogamo dog Parao ni, “Meno pe a ki i iya; Lubaŋa aye bidok iye ki Parao lok me kuc.”
Ci Parao owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Nen, iwaŋ lekka onoŋo acuŋ i ŋet kulu Nail;
ci dyaŋi abiro mucwe ma komgi pilpil gukatti woko ki i kulu Nail, gubedo ka camo lum tiro.
Ka dok dyaŋi mukene abiro bene gukatti woko gulubo korgi ima gigoro, komgi omok ma gujony woko liŋok, kit ma yam peya aneno i lobo me Ejipt ducu.
Ci dyaŋi ma komgi omok ma gujony woko liŋok-ki gucamo dyaŋi abiro mucweni woko;
ento kadi bed gucamogi woko, pe nene ni gucamogi, pien onoŋo pud gujony woko liŋok ma rom aroma ki kit ma nene gitye kwede. Ci aco woko ki iwaŋ nino.
Dok aneno ki i waŋ Lekka wit kal abiro ma gujany i kom tyen kal acel, ma wangi ŋaraŋara mabeco;
ka dok wite abiro muner ma wangi atati, ma gubwarre woko pi yamo malyet mua i tuŋ wokceŋ, gulot gudoŋo i ŋegi;
ci wite ma waŋgi atati-ni gumwonyo wite abiro mabeco-ni. Ci atito bot lutyet, ento pe tye ŋatti mo ma twero gonnya tere.”
Yucepu ogamo dog Parao owaco ni, “Lek pa Parao en lek acel; Lubaŋa doŋ onyuto ki Parao gin ma en bitiyo.
Dyaŋi abiro mabeco-ni nyuto mwaka abiro, ki wit kal abiro mabeco bene nyuto mwaka abiro; lek aryo-nu te lokgi acel.
Dyaŋi ma komgi otuk, ma gujony woko liŋok-ki ma dok gukatti woko gulubo korgi-ni, ki wit kal abiro mubwarre woko pi yamo malyet mua i tuŋ wokceŋ ca, meno nyuto mwaka abiro me kec.
Tye kit macalo doŋ atito ki Parao, Lubaŋa onyuto ki Parao gin ma en bitiyo.
Mwaka abiro bibedo ma cam bicek madwoŋ twatwal i lobo ducu me Ejipt,
ento i ŋegi dok bibino mwaka abiro me kec, ma wi dano biwil woko i lwak camgi ma guceko i lobo Ejipt. Kec bineko lobo woko libok;
ki lonyo cam madwoŋ-ŋi pe biŋene ni yam tye i lobo pi lok pa kec ma bilubone, pien kec meno bibedo gwa matek.
Lek pa Parao mudodde aryo-ni nyuto ni lok man Lubaŋa aye omoko, dok bimiyo timme i kare ma cok-ki.
“Mumiyo i kare man myero Parao oyer dano ma nen kwiri, maryek, ci oket en olo lobo Ejipt ducu.
Dok ber Parao omedde ka keto ludito ma guloyo lobo, wek gubed ka jogo dul acel me abic me cam ma ocek i lobo Ejipt i kin mwaka abiro ma piny ocek-ki.
Gin gubed ka guro cam ma ocek i mwaka mabeco ma cam bicek iye-ni, wek gigwok kal i te twero pa Parao, gikan me agwoka i gaŋi ducu.
Cam meno obed dero kec me agwoka ma gigwoko i lobo Ejipt pi kec ma bipoto mwaka abiro, wek kec pe onek lobo.” Yucepu odoko lalo lobo Ejipt
Tam man Parao oneno ni ber, kacel ki luticce ducu.
Parao owaco ki luticce ni, “Watwero noŋo dano mukene macalo man, ma Cwiny pa Lubaŋa tye kwede bene?”
Ci Parao owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Macalo Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko nyutti man ducu-ni, pi meno pe doŋ tye dano mo ma nen kwiri, maryek macalo in.
In aye doŋ ibiloyo oda, ki lwakka ducu gibitiyo kun gilubo gin ma iciko; kono nyo lok ma dok i kom komker keken, en aye bimiyo abedo dit makati.”
Parao dok owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Nen, doŋ atyeko keti me loyo lobo Ejipt ducu.”
Ci Parao okwanyo agitte ma olunyo ki i ciŋe, orwako i ciŋ Yucepu, dok oruke ki ginaruka me boŋo camanini maber, ka dok obolo nyor jabu i ŋute;
ka omiyo en oriŋo ki gadigadine me aryone, kun dano gidaŋŋe i nyime ni, “Rumu coŋwu!” Ci oketo en me loyo lobo Ejipt ducu kit meno.
Parao dok omedde lok ki Yucepu kun wacce ni, “An Parao; ka in pe iye, ci pe bibedo ŋatti mo ma bitiŋo ciŋe kadi tyene i lobo ducu me Ejipt.”
Ci Parao ocako nyiŋ Yucepu ni Japenat-panea; ci omiye Acenaci nya pa Potipera ajwaka me On me bedo dakone. Ci Yucepu ocako wot orumo lobo Ejipt ducu.
Yucepu onoŋo doŋ mwaka me ditte romo pyeradek i kare ma donyo i tic pa Parao kabaka me Ejipt. Yucepu okato woko ki i nyim Parao, ci owoto orumo lobo Ejipt ducu.
Cam ocek i lobo madwoŋ twatwal otyeko mwaka abiro,
ci ocoko cam ducu ma ocek i mwaka abiro-ni i kare ma lobo Ejipt oceko cam madwoŋ, ci okano cam i dero kec i gaŋi ducu; i gaŋ acel acel en okano cam mua i potti murumo kenyo.
Yucepu okano lwak cam madwoŋ i dero kec; cam obedo dwoŋ ma rom ki kweyo ma i dog nam, nio ka oweko pimone pien pe twero pimme.
Ma mwaka kec peya oromo, onoŋo Yucepu doŋ tye ki litino awobe aryo, ma Acenaci nya pa Potipera ajwaka me On onywalo kwede.
Yucepu ocako nyiŋ latin kayone ni Manace, kun wacci, “Pien Lubaŋa doŋ omiyo wiya owil woko ki i kom aromana ducu ki i kom jo ducu me ot pa wora.”
Nyiŋ latin me aryone ocako ni Epraim, ni, “Pien Lubaŋa omiya anywal i lobo ma abedo iye ki aroma.”
Ka mwaka abiro ma cam obedo ka cek iye madwoŋ twatwal i lobo Ejipt doŋ ogik,
ci mwaka abiro me kec ocakke, kit ma yam Yucepu owaconi. Kec opoto i lobo ducu; ento i lobo Ejipt ducu onoŋo cam tye.
Ka cam doŋ otum woko i lobo Ejipt ducu pi kec mupoto, dano gucako koko pi cam bot Parao; ci Parao owaco bot jo Ejipt ducu ni, “Wucit bot Yucepu wutim gin ma owacciwu.”
Ka kec opoto oromo lobo Ejipt ducu, ci Yucepu ocako yabo dog dero kec ducu, ocato cam bot jo Ejipt, pien onoŋo kec doŋ lyet twatwal i lobo Ejipt.
Lobo ducu gucako mol i Ejipt bot Yucepu ka wilo kal, pien onoŋo kec doŋ lyet twatwal i wi lobo ducu.
Ka Yakobo owinyo ni kal tye i Ejipt, owaco bot awobene ni, “Piŋo wubedo ka nenne anena?”
Ka owaco botgi ni, “Nen, an awinyo ni kal tye i Ejipt; wucit wuwilliwa kai kunnu, wek wabedu kwo, pe wato ki kec.”
Mumiyo omegi Yucepu apar gucito i Ejipt ka wilo kal.
Ento Yakobo pe ocwalo Benjamin, omin Yucepu, kacel ki omegine ca, pien obedo ka lworo ni gwok dok gibitime rac bene.
Kit meno awobe pa Icrael gucito ka wil i kin jo mukene ma gicito kunnu, pien onoŋo kec oromo lobo Kanaan ducu.
I kare meno onoŋo Yucepu odoko laloyo maber i lobo Ejipt; en obedo ka cato kal bot lwak me lobo meno. Ci omegi Yucepu bene gubino, gupoto piny aryeba cwiny i nyime, kun gukulo wangi i ŋom.
Ka Yucepu oneno omegine, ci oŋeyogi cut, ento obedo gwa i komgi, macalo gin Lurok ata, kun gerre agera ni, “Wun wua ki kwene?” Gugamo ni, “Waa ki i lobo Kanaan, wabino ka wilo cam.”
Kit-meno Yucepu oŋeyo omegine, ento gin pe gumedo ki ŋeye.
Yucepu ocako po lek ma yam oleko i komgi-ni; dok owaccigi ni, “Wun lurot piny do, wun wubino ka neno lobo-ni ka kabedo mo tye noŋo.”
Gugamo ni, “Pe kumeno Laditwa, wan luticci wabino giwa ka wilo cam.
Wan ducu awobe pa ŋat acel, wan jo ma iwa leŋ, wan pe lurot piny.”
Owaccigi ni, “Pe ya, wun wubino mewu ka neno kabedo mo ma tye nono.”
Gugamo dok ni, “Wan ducu wan omego apar wiye aryo, ma awobe pa laco acel ma tye i lobo Kanaan; ci ominwa matidine odoŋ bot wonwa, ki acel aye doŋ pe.”
Yucepu owaco ki gin ni, “Doŋ kara tye kit ma awacowu, ni wun lurot piny.
Pi lok meno, wun doŋ gibinenowu maber kit man: macalo Parao tye makwo-ni, wun pe doŋ wubia woko i kabedo-ni, ka ominwu matidi-ni pe obino kany.
Wucwal ŋat acel i kinwu, wek en ocikel ominwu, kun noŋo wun pud wudoŋ kany i mabuc, wek lokwu koŋ ginen maber, ka wun wutye ki ada i iwu. Ka pe, macalo Parao tye makwo-ni, wun lurot piny i ada.”
Ci oketogi ducu i mabuc pi nino adek.
Ka nino adek oromo, ci Yucepu owaco botgi ni, “Wutim kit man ci wubikwo, pien alworo Lubaŋa:
ka wun jo ma iwu leŋ, wuwek ŋat acel aye gitwe odoŋ i mabuc, wek jo mukene gucit paco guter kal ki jo ma paco pi larogi ki kec,
ka wucikel ominwu matidi-ni bota; miyo binen ni lokwu doŋ tye ada, ci pe wubito.” Ci gutimo kit meno.
Gucako lok gigi kekengi ni, “I adane, wan woroco i kom ominwa, pien waneno cwercwinye, ka yam bako doge botwa, ci pe wamedo ki winyone; mumiyo tin can man opoto i komwa bene.”
Reuben owacogi ni, “Yam pe atittiwu ni pe wutim bal mo i kom latin ca? Ento wun pe wumedo ki winyo, en aye mumiyo gipido pi remone i komwa-ni.”
Pe gumedo ki niaŋ ni Yucepu winyo lokgi-ni, pien onoŋo Iadum aye tye i kingi.
Ka oa woko ki botgi ci ocako koko; ka odok botgi obedo ka lok kwedgi. Omako
Yucepu ociko ni doŋ gipik kal opoŋ kicaa megi, ka dok gidwok lim pa dano acel acel gipik i kicaane, dok gumi botgi peke me wotgi. Man ducu gitimo botgi.
Ka gutweyo kal i ŋe kanagi, ci gucako wot.
Ka ŋat acel oyabo dog kicaane i kabedo ma gibuto iye-ni, wek emi cam ki kanane, ci oneno lim giketo i dog kicaane.
Ocako waco ki omegine ni, “Limma gidwoko kakare. Nen, tye i kicaana ene.” Ka guwinyo, ci cwinygi opoto nirim, gubedo ka cabbe kekengi ki myelkom kun giwaco ni, “Lubaŋa timowa kuman piŋo?”
Ka gudwogo bot wongi Yakobo i lobo Kanaan, gutitte gin ducu ma otimme i komgi, kun giwaco ni,
“Dano ma ladit me lobo-nu obedo ka lok ki gero i komwa, olokowa wadoko lurot piny.
Ento wan watitte ni, ‘Wan jo ma iwa leŋ, wan pe lurot piny.
Wan omego apar wiye aryo ma wonwa acel. Ominwa acel aye doŋ pe, ki acel matidine tye odoŋ bot wonwa i lobo Kanaan.’
Ci dano meno, ladit me lobo-nu, owaco botwa ni, ‘Man aye miyo abiniaŋ ni wun jo ma iwu leŋ: wuwek ominwu acel odoŋ bota, wuter kal me laro kec i pacowu, wek wuciti.
Wucikel ominwu matidini bota, ci doŋ abiŋeyo ni wun pe lurot piny, ento wun jo ma iwu leŋ, ci doŋ abimiyo ominwu i ciŋwu, dok wubicato wil i lobo-ni.’ ”
Ka gitye ka onyo kal ma i kicaa megi, ci dano acel acel onoŋo lim ma nene oboyo tye i kicaane. Ka gin ki wongi guneno lim ma giboyo, ci lworo omakogi matek.
Wongi Yakobo owaco ni, “Wutyeko litinona woko do. Yucepu doŋ pe, Cimeon bene doŋ pe, dok wumito tero Benjamin; man ducu canne poto i wiya.”
Reuben ocako waco bot wonne ni, “Ibineko litino awobena aryo-ni ducu ka ineno pe adwoko en paco boti. Miya acit kwede, ci abikelo en paco boti.”
Ento en ogamo, okwero woko ni, “Woda pe bicito kwedwu kunnu, pien ominne doŋ oto mere woko, en kene aye odoŋ. Ka gin marac dok otimme i kome i wotwuni, ci wubitero lwar wiya i lyel ki cwercwiny.”
dok kal ma gikelo ki i Ejipt doŋ gucamo otum woko, wongi owaco botgi ni, “Wudok kunnu, wuciwil ki wan cam mo manok.”
Juda ogamo doge ni, “Dano ca ocikowa matek kun waco ni, ‘Pe wubineno waŋa ka ominwu pe i kinwu.’
Ka icwalo ominwa owoto kwedwa, ci wabicito kunnu ka willi cam;
ento ka pe icwalo en, pe wabicito kunnu, pien dano ca owacowa ni, ‘Pe wubineno waŋa ka ominwu pe i kinwu.’ “
Icrael owacci, “Piŋo wutima marac kuman? Piŋo dok wutito ki dano ca ni wutye ki ominwu mukene?”

Gudok iye ni, “Dano ca openyowa ki lwak peny mapol i komwa ki i kom kakawa, kun waco ni, ‘Wonwu pud tye makwo? Ominwu mukene tye?’ Wan wadok iye i kom gin ma openyo; wan onoŋo watwero ŋeyo niŋniŋ ni en biwacci, ‘Wukel ominwu kany’?”
Juda owaco bot wonne Icrael ni, “Mi latin i ciŋa, cwale wawot kwede, ci wabia wacito, wek wabed kwo, pe wato, wan kacel ki in ki litinowa bene.
An abicuŋ pire; ibipenya pire. Ka ce pe abikelo en boti i kare ma adwogo, akete i nyimi, ci wek an aye abed won alii matwal;
pien ka nene pe wagalle, kono man doŋ wawirre kunnu kiryo.”

Ci wongi Icrael dokowaco botgi ni, “Ka doŋ myero obed kumeno ba, doŋ wutim kit man: wuter nyig yadi mogo ma wuyero me lobo-ni i kicaawu, wuter mot ki dano-nu, moo makur manok ki moo kic, odok yat ki murra, nyig otitimo ki yaa.
Dok wuter lim ma romo culo wil tyen aryo; wutiŋ lim ma nene gidwoko giketo i dog kicaawuni; gwok nyo yam wigi owil awila.
Wuter ki ominwu, wek wua, wucit dok bot dano-nu;
ber Lubaŋa Matwero-ducu aye omi kica omak dano-nu i komwu, wek ocwal ominwu mukene ca ki Benjamin. Ka gityeko litinona woko, doŋ gityeka arumo do!”
Ci gutero mot, ki wel lim ma dodo tyen aryo, kacel ki Benjamin; gua gucito i Ejipt, gucuŋ i nyim Yucepu.
Ka Yucepu oneno ni Benjamin tye i kingi, ci owaco bot lakan jamine me ot ni, “Kel jo-nu i ot, ka inek riŋo iyubi, pien gin koni gibicam kweda dyeceŋ.”
Dano meno otiyo kit ma Yucepu ocike, okelo jo-nu i ot pa Yucepu.

Lworo omako omegine ka giterogi i ot pa Yucepu, guwaco ni, “Man pi lok me lim, ma nene gidwoko giketo i dog kicaawa i kare mukwoŋo ca. Mumiyo gikelowa i ot-ti, wek enoŋ lok i komwa, emakwa, wek wadok opiine, ka dok ema lwak kanawa woko.”
Pi meno gucito bot lakan jami me ot pa Yucepu, guloko kwede ki i doggola,
guwacce ni, “Laditta, wan wabino kany ka wilo cam i kare mukwoŋo ca;
ka wao i kabedo ma wabuto iye-ni, wagonyo dog kicaawa, ci wanoŋo lim tye i dog kicaa pa ŋat acel acel ma i kinwa, limwa ducu onoŋo tye ki berre; en watyeko dwogo kwedeni,
ka dok wabino ki lim me wilo cam. Pe waŋeyo ŋat ma oketolimwa i kicaawa.”
En ogamo ni, “Wuywe ma cwinywu opye mot, pe lworo omakwu. Lubaŋa ma Lubaŋa pa wonwu en aye gwok nyo okano ki wun lim i kicaawu; an mera agamo limwu.” Ci ocito okelo Cimeon botgi.
Dano meno oterogi i ot pa Yucepu, omiyogi pii me lwoko tyengi, ka dok omiyo cam ki kanagi.
Guyubo motgi me atyera bot Yucepu ka bidwogo i dyeceŋ, pien guwinyo ni gibicam kunnu.
Ka Yucepu odwogo paco, gutero motgi bote i ot, guryebbe piny i nyime.
Openyogi ka gitye maber, kun waco ni, “Wonwu tye maber, ladit mo muti ma nene wuloko pire-ni pud tye makwo?”
Gugamo ni, “Laticci ma wonwa tye maber, pud tye makwo.” Gukulo wigi piny, guryebbe i nyime.
Ka otiŋo waŋe malo ci oneno ominne Benjamin, latin pa minne, owacci, “Man aye ominwu matidi-ni bo, ma nene wutitta pire-ni? Lubaŋa omini gum, latinna!”
Yucepu okato woko oyot, pien onoŋo cwinye pukke pi ominne, ocito oyenyo ka ma myero ekok iye. Ci odonyo ka koko i kicikane.
Ka olwoko waŋe, ci okatti woko kun diyo cwinye, owacci, “Doŋ gitok cam.”
Gitoko camme kene pat, ki megi bene pat, ki pa Luejipt ma yam gicamo kwedgi bene pat kakengi, pien Luejipt pe gicamo kacel ki jo Ibru, bedo me kwer ki bot Luejipt.
Gubedo piny i nyime, latin kayo macalo dit me anywalline tye kwede ki latin matidine kit macalo por me tidine tye kwede; ci gucako bedo ka nenne kekengi kun giuro.
Gipoko botgi cam kun gitoko a ki i meja pa Yucepu, ento pa Benjamin gipoko mere ododo pa omegine tyen abic kulu. Kit meno gimato, gibedo kwede ki yomcwiny.
Yucepu ociko lakan jami me ot ni, “Pik cam opoŋ kicaa pa jo-nu, mabup, ma gitwero tino; dok iket lim pa ŋat acel acel i dog kicaane,
ci iket kikopona, kikopo ryal-li, i dog kicaa pa latin matidi-ni, kacel ki limme me wilo kal.” En otimo kit macalo Yucepu owacce.
Ka piny doŋ oru maleŋ, ci gicwalo jo-nu gukato woko kacel ki kanagi.
Ka guwoto manok nia ki i gaŋ, Yucepu owaco ki lakan jamine ni, “Doŋ ilub kor jo-nu; ka imakogi, ci iwac botgi ni, ‘Piŋo wuculo gin maber ki gin marac? Piŋo wukwalo kikopo ryal mera woko?
Pe rwoda mato ki kikopo meno? Dok pe en aye tyeto kwede bene? Wutimo rac mada.’ ”
Ka omakogi i yo, ci owacogi lok meno.
Gugamo doge ni, “Lok aŋo mumiyo in laditwa iloko lakit lok meno? Wan luticci pe myero watim lakit tim macalo meno!
Nen ba, lim ma nene wanoŋo i dog kicaawa, wadwoko cen boti nia wa ki i lobo Kanaan; dok wan myero wakwal ryal nyo jabu ki i ot pa laditwa niŋniŋ?
Ka ce gibinoŋo tye bot ŋat mo i kinwa, wek en aye oto, wan bene wabibedo opiini laditwa.”
En ogamo ni, “Wuwek koŋ doŋ obed kit ma wuwaco-ni: ŋat ma gibinoŋo kikopo bote aye bibedo opiina, jo mukene bal bibedo pe i komgi.”
Ŋat acel acel ocako cibo yecce piny oyotoyot, ŋat acel acel oyabo dog kicaane.
Ka oyenyo dog kicaa nia ki kom pa ladit nio wa kom latin, ci ginoŋo kikopo i dog kicaa pa Benjamin.
Gucako yeco boŋŋigi pi cwercwiny, gin ducu gutweyo yec i ŋe kanagi, gudok i gaŋ.
Ka Juda ki omegine gudok i ot pa Yucepu, gunoŋo en pud tye kenyo; gupoto, guryebbe piny i nyime.
Yucepu owacogi ni, “Wun wutimo kit tim macalo man piŋo ce? Wun pe wuŋeyo ni dano macalo an-ni ŋeyo tyet?”

Juda ogamo kun waco ni, “Wan wabidok iye lok aŋo, ladit? Wabigamo lok aŋo kono? Wabikwanyo bal i komwa kekenwa niŋniŋ? Lubaŋa otyeko noŋo bal i komwa; nen, wan wadoko opiini, laditwa, wan ducu kacel ki ŋat ma ginoŋo kikopo bote-ni.”
Ento en ogamo ni, “An pe atwero timo kit eno! Ento ŋat ma ginoŋo kikopo boteni, aye bibedo opiina; ento ki tuŋ botwu wun wudok mewu bot wonwu ki kuc.”
Juda ocako cito bote, owacce ni, “Alegi laditta, wek an alok lok mo kwedi, pe iwek kinigani obed Lyet i koma, pien in irom ki Parao kikome.
Ladit, in yam ipenyowa ni, ‘Wun wutye ki wonwu, onyo omegiwu?’
Wan wagamo dogi ni, ‘Watye ki wonwa, dano muti doŋ, ki ominwa matidine latin me tiyone. Ominne aye oto woko, en aye odoŋ latin acel i kor minne; wonne bene maro en.’
Ka dok iwaco botwa ni, ‘Wukel en bota, wek aket waŋa i kome.’
Wan watito boti ni, ‘Latin awobi-nu pe twero weko ka ŋet wonne; ka ce opokke woko ki wonne, ci wonne to woko.’
Ento in onoŋo iwaco botwa ni, ‘Ka ominwu matidi-ni pe obino kany kacel kwedwu, pe dok wubineno waŋa.’
“Ka wadok paco bot wonwa ladit, ci watitte lokki ducu.
Ka wonwa owaco ni, ‘Wuwot dok wuciwil ki wan cam mo manok’,
wan wawacce ni, ‘Pe watwero dok Ka ominwa rmatidi-ni bicito kwedwa, ci wabidok kunnu, pien pe wabineno waŋ dano ca, ka ominwa matidi-ne pe i kinwa.’
Ci wora owacowa ni, ‘Wun wuŋeyo ni dakona onywalo litino awobe aryo;
acel oweka woko, ci yam awacci, Ada ŋuu okide woko, pe dok amedo ki nene matwal.
Ka dok wukwanyo man woko ki bota, ce gin marac bipoto i kome, ci wubitero lwar wiya i lyel ki: cwercwiny.’
“Mumiyo ka an adok bot wora;: ma latin awobi-ni pe i kinwa, macalo kwone ocuŋ i kom latin awobi-ni,
ka oneno ni latin awobi-ni pe i kinwa, ci en bito woko. Miyo wabitero lwar wi wonwa i lyel ki cwercwiny.
An nene acuŋ pi latin awobi man bot wora, kun awacce ni, ‘Ka pe abidwoko en boti, an abibedo won alii i nyim wora i kare me kwona ducu.’
Mumiyo kombeddi alegi ni ber iye an opiini, adoŋ ma ka latin awobi man, abed opiini, ladit; wek latin man odok paco kacel ki omegine.
Pien atwero dok paco bot wora niŋniŋ, ka pe latin-ni tye kweda? Alworo neno gin marac ka poto i kom wora.”

Yucepu diyo cwinye doŋ oloye woko ki i nyim lwak ducu ma gucuŋ ka ŋete, ci odaŋŋe ni, “Wumi dano ducu gua woko ki bota, guciti.” Kit meno ŋatti mo yam pe odoŋ bote i kare ma en nyutte kekene bot omegine.
Ocako koko matek ma Luejipt bene giwinyo, ki jo ma i gaŋ kal pa Parao bene guwinyo.
Yucepu owaco bot omegine ni, “An a Yucepu; wora mono pud tye makwo?” Ento omegine pe gitwero gamo doge, pien tipo komgi oto woko i nyime.
Yucepu owaco bot omegine ni, “Alegowu, wubin bota cok.” Gucito cok bote. Owacogi ni, “An aye ominwu Yucepu, ma yam wucato i Ejipt.
Pe doŋ wubed ki cwercwiny, pe cwinywu owaŋ i komwu kekenwu pi cato an kany; pien Lubaŋa aye yam ocwala kany i nyimwu, wek akony kwowu.
Pien kec doŋ obedo i lobo pi mwaka aryo; pud dok odoŋ mwaka abic ma pur ki kac bibedo pe.
Lubaŋa ocwalo an i nyimwu wek agwok ki wun jo ma bidoŋ wi lobo, ki pi gwoko ki wun jo mapol ma gibibwot makwo.
Pien wun aye yam pe wucwala kany, ento Lubaŋa gire; omiyo an adoko won Parao, ki lalo ode ducu ki lalo lobo Ejipt ducu.
Wutim oyot, wucit bot wora, wuciwacce ni, ‘Latinni Yucepu owaco kuman ni, Lubaŋa oketa abedo laloyo i Ejipt ducu; bin bota kany, pe dok iru.
Ibibedo i lobo Gocen, ibibedo cok kweda, in ki litinoni ki litino pa litinoni ducu, ki dyegini ki dyaŋi-gu ki gin ma itye kwedgi ducu.
Abipito in kunnu pien pud dok odoŋ mwaka me kec mukene abic i anyim; wek in ki jo ma i paconi, ki gin ma it ye kwedgi ducu pe wubed lucan.’
Iyo, kombeddi waŋwu oneno, ki waŋ omera Benjamin bene oneno ni an kikoma aye aloko kwedwu ki doga.
Myero wun wucitit bot wora kit deyona ducu ma atye kwede i Ejipt, ki gin ducu ma doŋ wuneno. Wucit oyot, wek wukel wora kany.”
Ocako poto i ŋut ominne Benjamin ki koko, ki Benjamin bene okok i ŋute.
Ka onoto lem omegine ducu kun kok; ka doŋ lacen omegine gucako boko lok kwede.
Ka lok owinnye wa ki i ot pa Parao ni, “Omegi Yucepu gubino”, pire oyomo cwiny Parao ki luticce matek.
Parao owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Wac bot omegini ni, ‘Wutim kit man, wutwe yec i ŋe kanawu, wudok cen i lobo Kanaan;
wutiŋ wonwu ki jowu, wek wubin bota; abimiyowu gin mabeco ma tye i lobo Ejipt, wucicamo moo ma i lobo-ni.’
“Dok icikgi ni, ‘Wutim kit man: Wuter gadigadi nia ki i lobo Ejipt kany pi litinowu matino ki pi mon mewu, wek wukel wonwu obin.
Pe wupar pi jamiwu, pien gin mabeco ma tye i lobo Ejipt ducu mewu.’ ”
Awobe pa Icrael gutiyo kit meno; Yucepu omiyogi gadigadi kit macalo Parao ociko, ka dok omiyogi peke me wotgi.
Omiyo botgi ducu ŋat acel acel boŋŋi mabeco me aruka i nino madito, ento bot Benjamin omiyo cekel me ryal miya adek ki ruk mabeco abic me nino madito.
Ocwalo bot wonne jami macalo man: Kana apar ma guyene ki jami mabeco ma oa ki i Ejipt, ki megi kana apar ma guyeyo kal, ki cam, ki peke me wot pa wongi.
Ka doŋ ocako cwalo omegine gucito. Ka doŋ gia ocikogi ni, “Pe wubed ka da iyo.”
Ka gua woko ki i Ejipt, ci gudwogo i lobo Kanaan bot wongi Yakobo.
Ka gutitte ni, “Yucepu pud tye makwo, en aye laloyo i lobo Ejipt ducu”; ci tipo kome oto woko lirut, pien onoŋo peya oye lokgi.
Ento ka doŋ gutitte lok kom Yucepu ducu, kit ma ocikogi kwede, ka dok pi neno lwak gadigadi ma Yucepu ocwalo pi tiŋo en, ka tipo kom wongi ocako dwogo.
Ka Icrael ocako lok ni, “Doŋ otum, woda Yucepu kara pud tye makwo; abiwot acito ka nene ma pud peya ato.”
Icrael ocako wot ki jami ma yam en tye kwedgi ducu; ka obino i Beer-ceba, ci otyero gitum bot Lubaŋa pa wonne Icaka.
Lubaŋa oloko ki Icrael i waŋ lek dyewor kun lwoŋe ni, “Yakobo, Yakobo.” En ogamo ni, “An a ene.”
Owacce ni, “An Lubaŋa, Lubaŋa pa woru; pe ilwor cito i Ejipt, pien abimiyi idoko rok madit kunnu.
Abicito kwedi wa i Ejipt, abidwoki cen bene; doki i kare ma ibito, ciŋ Yucepu biumo waŋi.”
Yakobo ocako wot ki i Beer-ceba, kun awobene gutiŋe, kacel ki litinogi matino, ki mongi, i gadigadi ma Parao ocwalo me tiŋogi.
Gutero limgi makwo ki jamigi ma yam gulimo ki i lobo Kanaan, gucito kwede i Ejipt; gutero Yakobo ki litinone ki likwaye ducu.
En owoto i Ejipt ki awobene ki anyirane ducu, wa ki likwaye ma co ki ma anyira.
Man aye nyiŋ likwayo pa Icrael ma gucito i Ejipt: Yakobo ki awobene. Reuben, latin kayo pa Yakobo,
ki awobe pa Reuben, aye Kanok, Pallu, Kejeron ki Karmi.
Awobe pa Cimeon aye Jemuel, Jamin, Okad, Jakin, Jokar ki Caul, ma awobi pa dako Lakanaan.
Awobe pa Levi aye Gercon, Kokat ki Merari.
Awobe pa Juda aye Er, Onan, Cela, Perej ki Jera, ento Er ki Onan guto woko i lobo Kanaan; awobe pa Perej aye Kejeron ki Kamul.
Awobe pa Icakar aye Tola, Puwa, Iob, ki Cimron.
Awobe pa Jabulon aye Cered, Elon ki Jaleel.
Meno aye awobe pa Lea ma en onywalo ki Yakobo i Paddan-aram, kacel ki nyare Dina; wel litino awobene ki anyirane giromo pyeradek wiye adek.
Awobe pa Gad aye Jipion, Kagi, Cuni, Ejibon, Eri, Arodi ki Areli.
Awobe pa Acer aye Imna, Iciva, Icivi, Beria ki Cera ma lamingi. Awobe pa Beria aye Keber ki Malkiel.
Meno aye litino awobe pa Jilpa, ma Laban omiyo bot Lea; en onywalo ki Yakobo litino apar wiye abicel.
Awobe pa Lakeri dako pa Yakobo aye Yucepu ki Benjamin.
Yucepu onywalo Manace ki Epraim ki i lobo Ejipt, ma Acenaci, nya, pa Potipera ajwaka me On aye onywalogi.
Awobe pa Benjamin aye Bela, Beker, Acibel, Gera, Naaman, Eki, Roc, Mupim, Kupim ki Arud.
Meno aye awobe pa Lakeri ma en onywalo ki Yakobo, litino ducu apar wiye aŋwen.
Awobi pa Dan aye Kucim.
Awobe pa Naputali aye Jajeel, Guni, Jejer ki Cilem.
Meno aye likwayo pa Bila ma Laban yam omiyo ki nyare Lakeri; en onywalo ki Yakobo litino ducu abiro.
Jo ducu ma tuŋ bot Yakobo ma yam ocito kwedgi i Ejipt, ma gin yam litinone ki likwaye kikome, ma pe gikwano iye mon pa litino awobene onoŋo giromo jo pyerabicel wiye abicel;
ki litino awobe ma nene Yucepu onywalogi ki i Ejipt, nene gin awobe aryo; pienno jo ducu ma tuŋ bot Yakobo ma gucito i Ejipt giromo pyerabiro. Yakobo ki jo ma i ode i Ejipt
Yakobo ocwalo Juda anyim bot Yucepu, wek onyuttigi yo ma cito i Gocen; ci guo i lobo Gocen.
Yucepu oyubo gadigadine me cito ka rwatte ki wonne Icrael i Gocen; ka ocito, onyutte kekene bote, ka opoto i ŋute kun kok kwede pi kare mo malac.
Icrael owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Tin to doŋ obin, pien doŋ aneno waŋi, aniaŋ ni pud ikwo ada.”
Yucepu owaco ki omegine ki jo ma i ot pa wonne ni, “Abidok ka tito ki Parao, abiwacce ni, ‘Omega ki jo ma i ot pa wora, ma yam gitye i lobo Kanaan, doŋ gutyeko bino bota;
gin lukwat, pien gin yam lukwat dyaŋi; dok gin gubino ki dyegigi ki dyaŋi-gu, ki gin ducu ma gitye kwede.’
Ka ce Parao olwoŋowu, ka openyowu ni, ‘Wun wutiyo tic aŋo?’
wun wudok iye ni, ‘Wan luticci wan lukwat dyaŋi nia ka tinowa nio kwede wa onyoo, wan kacel ki kwarowa’, wek wubed i Gocen, pien bedo me kwer bot Luejipt me bedo ki lakwat mo.”
Yucepu ocito ka tito bot Parao ni, “Wora ki omega, ki dyegigi ki dyaŋi-gu ki jamigi ducu gutyeko bino ki i lobo Kanaan; kombeddi doŋ gitye i lobo Gocen.”
Okwanyo jo abic ki i kin omegine, oterogi, onyutogi bot Parao.
Parao openyo omegine ni, “Wun wutiyo tic aŋo?” Gin guwaco bot Parao ni, “Wan luticci wan lukwat macalo kwariwa.”
Ka guwaco bot Parao ni, “Wan doŋ wabino ka bedo i lobo-ni; pien ka kwayo limwa aye pe, pien onoŋo kec doŋ Lyet twatwal i lobo Kanaan; kombeddi walegi ni, wek wabed i lobo Gocen.”
Parao owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Woru ki omegini doŋ gubino boti.
Lobo Ejipt tye boti, ket woru ki omegini i lobo maberre, wek gubed i lobo Gocen; ka iŋeyo i kingi jo makwiri, ci iketgi gubed ludito ma gwoko limma.”
Lacen Yucepu okelo wonne Yakobo, okete i nyim Parao, ci Yakobo olamo gum i kom Parao.
Parao owaco bot Yakobo ni, “In mono doŋ iri wi lobo mwaka adi kaa?”

Yakobo owaco bot Parao ni, “An doŋ ari wi lobo mwaka miya acel ki pyeradek macalo labedo. Ento mwaka ma ari kwede pud nok, dok opoŋ ki can, peya rom ki mwaka pa kwarina ma gubedo kwede macalo lubedo.”
Yako bo olamo gum i kom Parao, ka doŋ okato woko ki i nyime.
Yucepu omiyo ki wonne ki omegine kabedo i lobo Ejipt, i ŋom maberre, i Ramcec, kun miyogi lobo wek obed megi, kit macalo Parao ociko.
Yucepu ocako poko cam ki wonne, ki omegine ki bot jo ducu me ot pa wonne, kun lubo wel jo ma tye botgi. Loc pa Yucepu i kare me kec
I kare meno onoŋo cam doŋ pe i lobo ducu; pien onoŋo kec doŋ Lyet twatwal, omiyo jo ma i lobo Ejipt ki i lobo Kanaan kec obwoyogi woko.
Yucepu ocoko cente ducu ma yam tye i lobo Ejipt ki i lobo Kanaan, ma yam dano guwilo ki cam; ci otero i ot pa Parao.
Ka cente doŋ otum woko ki i lobo Ejipt ki i lobo Kanaan bene, ci jo Ejipt ducu gubino bot Yucepu, guwaco ni, “Miniwa cam; myero wato ki i komi ma ineno piŋo? Pien centewa doŋ otum woko.”
Yucepu ogamo ni, “Wumiya lim makwo, ci an abimiyowu cam aloko ki dyaŋwu, ka limwu me cente doŋ otum woko.”
Gucako kelo limgi makwo bot Yucepu, aguragura, romi, dyaŋi ki kana; ci Yucepu olokogi ki cam. I mwaka meno opoko botgi cam pi lwak lim makwo ma gukelo.

Ka mwaka meno doŋ otum, ci gubino bote i mwaka ma lubone, kun giwacce ni, “Wan pe doŋ wakano lok mo boti, laditwa, centewa doŋ watyeko woko ducu; ki lim makwo doŋ odoko pa laditwa; gin mo pe ma odoŋ i nyim laditwa, kono komwa ki lobowa keken.

Myero wato ki i komi ma inenowa piŋo, wan kacel ki lobowa? In iwilwa ki cam kacel ki lobowa, wan kacel ki lobowa wabibedo opii pa Parao; dok imiwa kodi wek wabed makwo, pe wato, wek lobo pe odoŋ noŋo.”
Kit meno Yucepu owilo lobo ducu me Ejipt obedo pa Parao; pien Luejipt ducu gucato pottigi woko, pi kec ma onoŋo doŋ Lyet twatwal. Lobo odoko pa Parao;
oloko dano ducu gubedo opii, nia i agikki lobo Ejipt tuŋ cel, nio tuŋ cel.
Lobo pa ajwagi keken aye pe giwilo, pien ajwagi onoŋo gitye ki camgi ma a ki i ciŋ Parao; onoŋo gubedo ka camo gin ma Parao miyogi, mumiyo pe gucato lobogi.
Yucepu dok owaco bot lwak ni, “Nen, i kare man atyeko wilowu ki lobo mewu me bedo pa Parao. Kombeddi doŋ wugam kodi ma wubicoyo i lobo.
I kare me kac wubimiyo acel me abic bot Parao, ki dul aŋwen me abic bibedo mewu, pi kodi me acoya i pottiwu, ki pi camwu, ki jo ma i pacowu, ki cam pa litinowu.”
Gugamo ni, “Doŋ ityeko laro kwowa, wek berwa onen i nyimi, ladit, wan wabibedo opii pa Parao.”
Pi lok man Yucepu oketo odoko cik i lobo Ejipt, pud tye nio wa onyoo, ni, Parao myero oter dul acel me abic; lobo pa ajwagi keken aye pe odoko pa Parao. Yakobo ociko Yucepu me agikkine
Jo Icrael gubedo i lobo Ejipt, i lobo Gocen; gunoŋo iye lim, gumedde, gunya mapol.
Yakobo obedo i lobo Ejipt mwaka apar wiye abiro; kit meno nino pa Yakobo, mwaka me kwone ducu, oromo miya acel ki pyeraŋwen wiye abiro.
Ka kare me to pa Icrael doŋ onyiko cok, ci olwoŋo wode Yucepu, owacce ni, “Ka doŋ berra onen boti, ci irwak ciŋi, odony ki piny i te ema, icikke kweda ki gen ki ada ni, pe ibiyika i Ejipt,
ento wek acibut kacel ki kwarina; tiŋa woko ki i Ejipt, ci iciyika i kabedo ma giyikogi iye.” En ogamo ni, “Abitiyo kit ma doŋ iwaco-ni.”
Dok owaco ni, “Kwoŋŋa kwoŋ,” ci ocako kwoŋo kwoŋ. Lacen Icrael okulo wiye piny i wi kitandane.
Lacen gitito bot Yucepu ni, “Nen, woru kome lit;” ci otero litino awobene aryo, Manace ki Epraim.
Ka gitito ki Yakobo ni, “Wodi Yucepu obino boti,” ci Icrael ocukke oa malo, obedo i wi kitanda.
Yakobo owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Lubaŋa Matwero-ducu yam onen bota i Luj i lobo Kanaan, omiya iye gum,
owacca ni, ‘Nen, abimiyi inya imedde mapol, dok abimiyi idoko rok mapol, abimiyo lobo man bot likwayi ki jo ma bilubogi obed megi matwal.’
Awobeni aryo-ni ma inywalogi i lobo Ejipt ma onoŋo peya abino boti i Ejipt, meno mera gira; Epraim ki Manace gibibedo litinona, macalo Reuben ki Cimeon bene.
Litino ma ginywalogi ki i ŋegi bibedo meri, ento gibikwanogi ki nyiŋ omegigi i kare ma gipoko lobo me bedo ginaleyagi.
Pien ka yam aa ki i Paddan, me cwercwiny Lakeri otona woko i lobo Kanaan i waŋayo, munoŋo Eprat pud kiborbor; ci ayiko en i yo ma cito Eprat, en aye Beterekem.”
Ka Icrael oneno awobe pa Yucepu, ci owacci, “Man kono jo mene?”
Yucepu ogamo dog wonne ni, “Gin litino awobena, ma Lubaŋa omiya ki kany.” Ka owacci, “Kelgi bota kany, wek alam gum i komgi.”
I kare meno onoŋo Yako bo doŋ oti, waŋe ocido woko, ma pe doŋ neno piny. Ka Yucepu okelogi cok bote, ci onoto lemgi ka okwakogi ki bade.
Icrael owaco bot Yucepu ni, “Onoŋo yam atamo ni pe dok abineno waŋi; nen, ka Lubaŋa dok omiyo aneno wa litinoni bene.”
